ReferenceBlocks.text: When the people of that place recognized him, they sent into all that surrounding region, and brought to him all who were sick.

block.text: Ol man bilong dispela hap ol i lukim Jisas na ol i luksave long em, na ol i salim tok i go long olgeta ples i stap klostu, na ol i bringim olgeta sikman i kam long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They begged him that they might just touch the fringe of his garment. As many as touched it were made whole.

block.text: Na ol i askim Jisas strong long larim ol sikman i putim han long arere bilong klos bilong em. Na olgeta manmeri i mekim olsem, ol i kamap orait gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 15
Then Pharisees and scribes came to Jesus from Jerusalem, saying,

block.text: Long dispela taim sampela Farisi na saveman bilong lo ol I lusim Jerusalem na ol i kam long Jisas. Na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do your disciples disobey the tradition of the elders? For they don’t wash their hands when they eat bread.”

block.text: "Olsem wanem na ol disaipel bilong yu ol i save brukim lo ol tumbuna I bin givim long yumi? Taim ol i laik kaikai, ol i no save wasim han."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered them,

block.text: Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you also disobey the commandment of God because of your tradition?

block.text: "Olsem wanem na yupela i save bihainim pasin bilong yupela yet, na yupela i brukim lo bilong God?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For God commanded, ‘Honor your father and your mother,’ and, ‘He who speaks evil of father or mother, let him be put to death.’

block.text: God i tok, 'Yu mas aninit long pamama bilong yu na bihainim tok bilong ol,' na 'Man i mekim tok nogut long papa o mama bilong en, em i mas i dai.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you say, ‘Whoever may tell his father or his mother, “Whatever help you might otherwise have gotten from me is a gift devoted to God,”

block.text: Tasol yupela i save tok olsem, 'Sapos wanpela man i gat mani samting bilong helpim papa o mama bilong en, tasol em i tokim tupela, "Mi makim dispela pinis bilong givim long God,"

ReferenceBlocks.text: he shall not honor his father or mother.’ You have made the commandment of God void because of your tradition.”

block.text: orait dispela man i no mas tingting long papa na mekim gut long em.' Long dispela pasin yupela i save daunim tok bilong God na litimapim pasin yupela i bin kisim long ol tumbuna.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You hypocrites! Well did Isaiah prophesy of you, saying,

block.text: "Yupela i man bilong giaman. Profet Aisaia i bin makim tru pasin bilong yupela taim em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: ‘These people draw near to me with their mouth, and honor me with their lips; but their heart is far from me.

block.text: 'Ol dispela lain manmeri ol i save litimapim nem bilong mi long maus bilong ol, tasol bel na tingting bilong ol i stap longwe tru long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And in vain do they worship me, teaching as doctrine rules made by men.’”

block.text: Ol i save autim lo bilong ol man tasol na tok, "Dispela em i tok bilong God." Olsem na ol i lotu nating long mi.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He summoned the multitude, and said to them,

block.text: Orait Jisas i singautim ol manmeri i kam long em, na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hear, and understand.
That which enters into the mouth doesn’t defile the man; but that which proceeds out of the mouth, this defiles the man.”

block.text: "Yupela harim na tingim gut.
Samting i go insait long maus bilong wanpela man, em i no save mekim man i kamap doti. Nogat. Tasol samting maus i autim, em tasol i mekim man i doti."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the disciples came, and said to him,

block.text: Bihain ol disaipel i kam tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you know that the Pharisees were offended, when they heard this saying?”

block.text: "Ating yu save olsem ol Farisi i harim dispela tok bilong yu na ol i bel nogut?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Every plant which my heavenly Father didn’t plant will be uprooted.

block.text: "Papa bilong mi i stap long heven, em i gat gaden. Na olgeta samting em yet i no bin planim, bai em i kamautim wantaim ol rop bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Leave them alone. They are blind guides of the blind. If the blind guide the blind, both will fall into a pit.”

block.text: Yupela i no ken wari long ol dispela man. Ol i olsem ol aipas, na ol i laik soim rot long ol arapela. Tasol sapos aipas i soim rot long narapela aipas, orait tupela wantaim bai i pundaun long hul."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter answered him,

block.text: Na Pita i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Explain the parable to us.”

block.text: "Inap yu autim as bilong dispela tok piksa yu bin givim long ol manmeri, na mipela i ken harim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: So Jesus said,

block.text: Na Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you also still not understand?

block.text: "Olsem wanem? Yupela tu i no klia yet?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t you see that whatever goes into the mouth passes into the belly, and then out of the body?

block.text: Ating yupela i no save, olgeta samting i go insait long maus, em i save go long bel, na bel i save rausim i go daun long smolhaus?

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the things which proceed out of the mouth come out of the heart, and they defile the man.

block.text: Tasol samting maus i autim, dispela i save kamap long tingting. Na dispela samting i save mekim man i doti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For out of the heart come forth evil thoughts, murders, adulteries, sexual sins, thefts, false testimony, and blasphemies.

block.text: Mi tok long olkain samting i save kamap long tingting bilong man, em ol samting olsem, ol tingting nogut na pasin bilong kilim man i dai na olkain pasin pamuk na pasin bilong bagarapim marit na pasin bilong stil na pasin bilong tok giaman long kot na pasin bilong tok nogut long ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These are the things which defile the man; but to eat with unwashed hands doesn’t defile the man.”

block.text: Ol dispela pasin i save mekim man i doti long ai bilong God. Tasol man i kaikai na i no wasim han pastaim, dispela pasin i no mekim em i doti."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus went out from there, and withdrew into the region of Tyre and Sidon.

block.text: Orait Jisas i lusim dispela ples na i go long hap bilong taun Tair na Saidon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, a Canaanite woman came out from those borders, and crying out she said,

block.text: Na wanpela meri bilong lain Kenan i save stap long dispela hap, em i kam na i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have mercy on me, Lord, you son of David! My daughter is severely demonized!”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu Pikinini Bilong Devit, yu mas sori long mi. Spirit nogut i bagarapim tru pikinini meri bilong mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he answered her not a word. His disciples came and begged him, saying,

block.text: Tasol Jisas i no bekim wanpela tok long em. Na ol disaipel bilong en i kam long em na ol i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Send her away; for she cries out after us.”

block.text: "Dispela meri em i singaut singaut na i bihainim yumi i kam. Yu salim em i go."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I wasn’t sent to anyone but the lost sheep of the house of Israel.”

block.text: "God i bin salim mi i kam long ol lain bilong Israel tasol, bilong helpim ol dispela sipsip i lus."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But she came and worshiped him, saying,

block.text: Tasol meri i kam klostu long Jisas na i brukim skru na putim pes i go daun long graun, na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, help me.”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu mas helpim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is not appropriate to take the children’s bread and throw it to the dogs.”

block.text: "Nogut yumi kisim kaikai bilong ol pikinini na tromoi i go long ol dok."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But she said,

block.text: Tasol meri i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes, Lord, but even the dogs eat the crumbs which fall from their masters’ table.”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu tok tru. Tasol ol dok i save kisim ol hap kaikai i pundaun aninit long tebol bilong ol papa bilong ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Jesus answered her,

block.text: Jisas i harim dispela tok na em i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woman, great is your faith! Be it done to you even as you desire.”

block.text: "Meri, bilip bilong yu em I bikpela tru. Samting yu laik i mas kamap long yu, em i ken kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: And her daughter was healed from that hour.

block.text: Na long dispela taim stret, pikinini meri bilong en i kamap orait gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus departed there, and came near to the sea of Galilee; and he went up into the mountain, and sat there.

block.text: Orait Jisas i lusim dispela ples na i wokabaut i go long arere bilong raunwara Galili. Na em i go antap long maunten na i sindaun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Great multitudes came to him, having with them the lame, blind, mute, maimed, and many others, and they put them down at his feet and he healed them.

block.text: Na planti lain manmeri i kam long em. Na ol i bringim ol lek nogut na ol aipas na ol bun krungut na ol mauspas na planti arapela sikman tu, na ol i putim klostu long lek bilong Jisas. Na em i mekim ol i kamap orait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The people were amazed when they saw the mute speaking, injured whole, lame walking, and blind seeing--and they glorified the God of Israel.

block.text: Na ol manmeri i lukim ol mauspas i toktok na ol bun krungut i kamap orait na ol lek nogut i wokabaut na ol aipas i lukluk, na ol i tingting planti. Na ol i litimapim nem bilong God bilong Israel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus summoned his disciples and said,

block.text: Jisas i singautim ol disaipel bilong en i kam, na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I have compassion on the multitude, because they continue with me now three days and have nothing to eat. I don’t want to send them away fasting, or they might faint on the way.”

block.text: "Mi sori long dispela ol manmeri. Ol i stap wantaim mi inap tripela de pinis na ol i no gat kaikai. Mi no laik bai ol i stap hangre na mi salim ol i go. Nogut ai bilong ol i raun na ol i pundaun long rot."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The disciples said to him,

block.text: Na ol disaipel i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where should we get so many loaves in a deserted place as to satisfy so great a multitude?”

block.text: "Dispela hap i no gat man. Bai yumi kisim planti bret we na givim kaikai long kain bikpela lain olsem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i askim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How many loaves do you have?”

block.text: "Yupela i gat hamas bret i stap?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said,

block.text: Na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Seven, and a few small fish.”

block.text: "Mipela i gat 7 -pela bret na ol wan wan liklik pis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He commanded the people, saying:

block.text: Orait na Jisas i tokim ol manmeri na ol

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Sit down on the ground.”

block.text: i sindaun long graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He took the seven loaves and the fish. He gave thanks and broke them, and gave to the disciples, and the disciples to the multitudes.

block.text: Na em i kisim dispela 7 -pela bret na ol pis, na em i tenkyu long God, na em i brukim na givim long ol disaipel. Na ol disaipel i givim long ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They all ate, and were filled. They took up seven baskets full of the broken pieces that were left over.

block.text: Na olgeta i kaikai na i pulap. Na ol i bungim ol liklik hap kaikai i stap yet na pulapim 7 -pela basket.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who ate were four thousand men, besides women and children.

block.text: Ol man i kaikai i olsem 4,000 man. Na ol i no kaunim ol meri na pikinini.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he sent away the multitudes, got into the boat, and came into the borders of Magdala.

block.text: Na Jisas i salim ol manmeri i go, na em i kalap long bot na i go long hap bilong Magadan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 16
The Pharisees and Sadducees came to test him and said,

block.text: Ol Farisi na Sadyusi i kam long Jisas na ol i laik traim em. Ol i tokim em long

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Show us a sign from Heaven.”

block.text: wokim wanpela mirakel olsem mak bilong soim ol olsem em i mekim wok bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he answered them,

block.text: Tasol em i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “When it is evening, you say, ‘It will be fair weather, for the sky is red.’

block.text: "Long apinun yupela i save tok, 'Skai i retpela. Bai gutpela taim nau.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the morning, ‘It will be foul weather today, for the sky is red and threatening.’ Hypocrites! You know how to discern the appearance of the sky, but you can’t discern the signs of the times!

block.text: Na long moningtaim yupela i save tok, 'Klaut i blak na skai i retpela. Olsem na nau bai i gat win na ren.' Yes, yupela i save lukim ol mak bilong skai na skelim gut. Tasol yupela i no save lukim na skelim ol mak bilong dispela taim nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: An evil and adulterous generation seeks after a sign, and there will be no sign given to it, except the sign of the prophet Jonah.”

block.text: Ol manmeri bilong dispela taim ol i lain manmeri nogut na ol i no save bel tru long God. Oltaim ol i save singaut long lukim mak. Tasol ol bai i no inap lukim wanpela mak. Nogat. Wanpela mak tasol bai ol i lukim, em mak bilong profet Jona."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He left them, and departed.

block.text: Na Jisas i lusim ol na i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The disciples came to the other side and had forgotten to take bread.
Jesus said to them,

block.text: Jisas wantaim ol disaipel i go kamap long hapsait bilong raunwara, tasol ol disaipel i lusim tingting na ol i no kisim bret i kam wantaim.
Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take heed and beware of the yeast of the Pharisees and Sadducees.”

block.text: "Yupela was gut. Yupela lukaut long yis bilong ol Farisi na ol Sadyusi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They reasoned among themselves, saying,

block.text: Na ol disaipel i toktok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We brought no bread.”

block.text: "Ating em i mekim dispela tok, long wanem, yumi no kisim bret i kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus, perceiving it, said,

block.text: Jisas i save long dispela toktok ol i mekim, na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you reason among yourselves, you of little faith, ‘because you have brought no bread?’

block.text: "Yupela man i gat liklik bilip tasol. Bilong wanem yupela i wok long tok olsem, 'Yumi no gat bret'?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t you yet not understand nor remember the five loaves for the five thousand, and how many baskets you took up?

block.text: Ating yupela i no klia yet? Ating yupela i no tingim dispela 5 -pela bret ol 5,000 man i kaikai, na hamas basket yupela i pulapim?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nor the seven loaves for the four thousand, and how many baskets you took up?

block.text: Na ating yupela i no tingim dispela 7 -pela bret ol 4,000 man i kaikai, na hamas basket yupela i pulapim?

ReferenceBlocks.text: How is it that you don’t perceive that I didn’t speak to you concerning bread? But beware of the yeast of the Pharisees and Sadducees.”

block.text: Bilong wanem yupela i no save olsem, mi no tingting long bret na mi givim tok long yupela? Mi tok, yupela i mas lukaut gut long yis bilong ol Farisi na ol Sadyusi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they understood that he didn’t tell them to beware of the yeast of bread, but of the teaching of the Pharisees and Sadducees.

block.text: Ol i harim dispela tok na ol i save, em i no tok long ol i mas lukaut long yis bilong wokim bret. Nogat. Em i tok long ol i mas lukaut long tok bilong ol Farisi na ol Sadyusi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now when Jesus came into the parts of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying,

block.text: Jisas i go long hap bilong taun Sisaria Filipai, na long dispela taim em i askim ol disaipel bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who do men say that I, the Son of Man, am?”

block.text: "Ol manmeri i save tok Pikinini Bilong Man em i husat tru?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said,

block.text: Na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Some say John the Baptizer, some, Elijah, and others, Jeremiah, or one of the prophets.”

block.text: "Sampela i save tok, yu Jon Bilong Baptais. Na sampela i tok, yu Elaija. Na sampela i save tok, yu Jeremaia o wanpela profet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i askim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But who do you say that I am?”

block.text: "Na yupela yet i tok mi husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon Peter answered,

block.text: Saimon Pita i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are the Christ, the Son of the living God.”

block.text: "Yu dispela man God i bin makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en. Yu Pikinini Bilong God i gat laip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Orait Jisas I bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Blessed are you, Simon Bar Jonah, for flesh and blood has not revealed this to you, but my Father who is in heaven.

block.text: "Saimon, pikinini bilong Jon, yu ken amamas. I no gat wanpela man bilong graun i bin soim dispela tok long yu. Nogat. Papa bilong mi i stap long heven em tasol i soim dispela long yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I also tell you that you are Peter, and on this rock I will build my assembly, and the gates of Hades will not prevail against it.

block.text: Na mi tokim yu olsem. Yu Pita, na bai mi wokim sios bilong mi antap long dispela ston. Na bai strong bilong Dai i no inap daunim dispela sios.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will give to you the keys of the Kingdom of Heaven, and whatever you bind on earth will have been bound in heaven; and whatever you release on earth will have been released in heaven.”

block.text: Bai mi givim ol ki bilong kingdom bilong heven long yu. Samting yu pasim long graun, em bai God i pasim long heven tu. Na samting yu lusim long graun, em bai God i lusim long heven."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he commanded the disciples that they should tell no one that he was Jesus the Christ.

block.text: Na Jisas i tambuim ol disaipel strong long ol i no ken tokim wanpela man olsem em yet em i dispela man God i bin promis long salim i kam bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: From that time, Jesus began to show his disciples that he must go to Jerusalem and suffer many things from the elders, chief priests, and scribes, and be killed, and the third day be raised up.

block.text: Long dispela taim Jisas i stat long tokim ol disaipel olsem em i mas i go long Jerusalem, na em i mas karim planti pen long han bilong ol hetman wantaim ol bikpris na ol saveman bilong lo. Na bai ol i kilim em i dai, na long de namba 3 bai em i kirap bek.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter took him aside, and began to rebuke him, saying,

block.text: Pita i harim dispela tok na em i kisim Jisas i go long arere na i stat long krosim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Far be it from you, Lord! This will never be done to you.”

block.text: "Bikpela, nogat tru. Dispela samting i no inap kamap long yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he turned, and said to Peter,

block.text: Na Jisas i tanim na i tokim Pita olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Get behind me, Satan! You are a stumbling block to me, for you are not setting your mind on the things of God, but on the things of men.”

block.text: "Satan, yu go baksait long mi. Yu laik pasim rot bilong mi. Yu no bihainim tingting bilong God. Nogat. Yu bihainim tingting bilong ol man tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Jesus said to his disciples,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol disaipel bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If anyone desires to come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.

block.text: "Sapos wanpela man i laik bihainim mi, orait em i mas daunim laik bilong em yet, na em i mas karim diwai kros bilong en na bihainim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For whoever desires to save his life will lose it, and whoever will lose his life for my sake will find it.

block.text: Long wanem, sapos wanpela man i laik holimpas laip bilong em yet, laip bilong en bai i lus. Tasol sapos wanpela man i ting long mi na i lusim laip bilong en, em bai i kisim laip bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For what will it profit a man, if he gains the whole world, and forfeits his life? Or what will a man give in exchange for his life?

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i kisim olgeta samting bilong graun, tasol laip bilong em yet i lus, orait dispela olgeta samting bai i helpim em olsem wanem? Bai man i givim wanem pe bilong baim bek laip bilong en?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the Son of Man will come in the glory of his Father with his angels, and then he will render to everyone according to his deeds.

block.text: Pikinini Bilong Man bai i stap long bikpela lait bilong Papa bilong en, na em bai i kam wantaim ol ensel bilong en. Long dispela taim em bai i givim pe long olgeta manmeri inap long pasin ol i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, there are some standing here who will in no way taste of death, until they see the Son of Man coming in his Kingdom.”

block.text: Mi tok tru long yupela, sampela man i sanap hia bai ol i no i dai yet, na bai ol i lukim Pikinini Bilong Man i kam olsem king."

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 17
After six days, Jesus took with him Peter, James, and John his brother, and brought them up into a high mountain by themselves.

block.text: 6-pela de i go pinis, orait Jisas i kisim Pita na Jems wantaim brata bilong en Jon, na em i bringim ol i go long wanpela maunten i antap moa. Na ol tasol i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He was transfigured before them. His face shone like the sun, and his garments became as white as the light.

block.text: Na taim ol i lukluk i stap, bodi bilong Jisas i senis na i kamap narakain. Na pes bilong en i lait olsem san, na laplap samting bilong en i kamap waitpela olsem lait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, Moses and Elijah appeared to them talking with him.

block.text: Na Moses wantaim Elaija tupela i kamap na ol disaipel i lukim tupela i toktok wantaim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter answered, and said to Jesus,

block.text: Pita i lukim dispela na em i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, it is good for us to be here. If you want, let’s make three tents here: one for you, one for Moses, and one for Elijah.”

block.text: "Bikpela, yumi stap hia, em i gutpela. Sapos yu laik, orait mi ken sanapim tripela haus win, wanpela bilong yu na wanpela bilong Moses na wanpela bilong Elaija."

ReferenceBlocks.text: While he was still speaking, behold, a bright cloud overshadowed them. Behold, a voice came out of the cloud, saying,

block.text: Pita i toktok yet na wanpela klaut i lait tumas i karamapim ol. Na wanpela maus insait long dispela klaut i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased. Listen to him.”

block.text: "Dispela em i Pikinini bilong mi, mi laikim em tumas, na mi amamas long em. Yupela harim tok bilong em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the disciples heard it, they fell on their faces, and were very afraid.

block.text: Ol disaipel i harim dispela tok, na ol i brukim skru na putim pes i go daun long graun, na ol i pret tumas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus came and touched them, saying:

block.text: Na Jisas i kam klostu long ol na i holim ol, na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Get up, and don’t be afraid.”

block.text: "Yupela kirap. Yupela i no ken pret."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Lifting up their eyes, they saw no one, except Jesus alone.

block.text: Na ol i lukluk i go antap, na ol i no lukim narapela man. Nogat. Ol i lukim Jisas wanpela tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As they were coming down from the mountain, Jesus commanded them, saying,

block.text: Orait ol i lusim maunten na i wokabaut i go daun yet, na Jisas i tokim ol strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t tell anyone what you saw, until the Son of Man has risen from the dead.”

block.text: "Dispela samting yupela i bin lukim, yupela i no ken tokim wanpela man long en, i go inap long taim Pikinini Bilong Man i lusim matmat na i kirap bek."

ReferenceBlocks.text: His disciples asked him, saying,

block.text: Na ol disaipel i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Then why do the scribes say that Elijah must come first?”

block.text: "Bilong wanem ol saveman bilong lo i save tok long Elaija i mas i kam pastaim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Na em i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Elijah indeed comes first, and will restore all things.

block.text: "Dispela tok em i tru. Elaija em i mas i kam na stretim bek olgeta samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I tell you that Elijah has come already, and they didn’t recognize him, but did to him whatever they wanted to. Even so the Son of Man will also suffer by them.”

block.text: Tasol mi tokim yupela olsem, Elaija em i kam pinis, na ol man i no bin save long em. Nogat. Ol i bihainim laik bilong ol yet na ol i mekim ol kain kain pasin long em. Na long wankain pasin bai ol i mekim nogut long Pikinini Bilong Man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the disciples understood that he spoke to them of John the Baptizer.

block.text: Jisas i tok olsem, na ol disaipel i save, em i toktok long Jon Bilong Baptais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they came to the multitude, a man came to him, kneeling down to him, saying,

block.text: Jisas wantaim tripela disaipel i go kamap long bikpela lain manmeri, na wanpela man i kam long Jisas na i brukim skru long em
na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, have mercy on my son, for he is epileptic, and suffers grievously; for he often falls into the fire, and often into the water.

block.text: "Bikpela, yu ken sori long pikinini man bilong mi. Em i save kamap longlong na bodi bilong en i stap nogut tru. Na planti taim em i save pundaun long paia, na planti taim em i save pundaun long wara.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So I brought him to your disciples, and they could not cure him.”

block.text: Na mi bringim em i go long ol disaipel bilong yu, na ol i no inap mekim em i kamap orait."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Faithless and perverse generation! How long will I be with you? How long will I bear with you? Bring him here to me.”

block.text: "Yupela lain manmeri i no bilip, tingting na pasin bilong yupela i no stret tru. Hamas taim bai mi stap yet wantaim yupela? Hamas taim moa bai mi karim hevi bilong yupela? Bringim dispela pikinini i kam hia long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus rebuked him, the demon went out
of him, and the boy was cured from that hour.

block.text: Na Jisas i krosim dispela spirit nogut, na spirit nogut i lusim
dispela pikinini na wantu sik bilong en i pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the disciples came to Jesus privately, and said,

block.text: Na bihain ol disaipel tasol i kam long Jisas na i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why weren’t we able to cast it out?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem na mipela i no inap long rausim dispela spirit nogut?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Because of your unbelief. For most certainly I tell you, if you have faith as a grain of mustard seed, you will tell this mountain, ‘Move from here to there,’ and it will move; and nothing will be impossible for you.

block.text: "Bilip bilong yupela em i liklik tumas, olsem na yupela i no inap. Mi tok tru long yupela, sapos yupela i gat bilip inap olsem liklik pikinini bilong dispela kain sayor ol i kolim mastet, orait bai yupela inap tokim dispela maunten hia, 'Yu kirap na yu go long hap,' na em bai i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But this kind doesn’t go out except by prayer and fasting.”

block.text: Na bai i no gat wanpela wok yupela i no inap long mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: While they were staying in Galilee, Jesus said to them,

block.text: Jisas wantaim ol disaipel i bung long distrik Galili, na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Son of Man is about to be delivered up into the hands of men,
and they will kill him, and the third day he will be raised up.”

block.text: "Ol bai i putim Pikinini Bilong Man long han bilong ol man,
na ol bai i kilim em i dai. Na long de namba 3 em bai i kirap bek."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were exceedingly sorry.

block.text: Ol disaipel i harim dispela tok na ol i bel hevi tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had come to Capernaum, those who collected the didrachma coins came to Peter, and said,

block.text: Bihain Jisas wantaim ol disaipel i go kamap long taun Kaperneam, na ol man bilong kisim takis bilong tempel i kam long Pita na askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Doesn’t your teacher pay the temple tax?”

block.text: "Ating tisa bilong yupela i save givim takis bilong tempel?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na Pita i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes.”

block.text: "Yes."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he came into the house, Jesus anticipated him, saying,

block.text: tok yet, Jisas i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What do you think, Simon? From whom do the kings of the earth receive toll or tribute? From their children, or from strangers?”

block.text: "Saimon, yu ting wanem? Ol king bilong dispela graun i save kisim pe bilong ol kain kain takis long husat? Ol i save kisim long ol lain bilong ol yet, o long ol arapela man?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter said to him,

block.text: Na Pita i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “From strangers.”

block.text: "Long ol arapela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Therefore the children are exempt.

block.text: "Olsem na ol lain bilong ol yet i no mas givim takis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But, lest we cause them to stumble, go to the sea, cast a hook, and take up the first fish that comes up. When you have opened its mouth, you will find a four Drachma coin. Take that, and give it to them for me and you.”

block.text: Tasol nogut yumi mekim ol i kros long yumi. Yu go long raunwara na tromoi huk. Na namba wan pis yu pulim, em yu kisim na opim maus bilong en, na bai yu lukim wanpela mani i stap insait. Yu kisim dispela mani na givim long ol, bilong inapim takis bilong mitupela wantaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 18
In that hour the disciples came to Jesus, saying,

block.text: Long dispela taim ol disaipel i kam long Jisas na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who then is greatest in the Kingdom of Heaven?”

block.text: "Husat bai i gat biknem tru long kingdom bilong heven?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus called a little child to himself, and set him in their midst,
and said,

block.text: Orait Jisas i singautim wanpela pikinini i kam na em i sanapim em namel long ol.
Na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you, unless you turn, and become as little children, you will in no way enter into the Kingdom of Heaven.

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, sapos yupela i no senis na kamap olsem ol liklik pikinini, bai yupela i no inap i go insait long kingdom bilong heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whoever therefore humbles himself as this little child, the same is the greatest in the Kingdom of Heaven.

block.text: Man i daunim em yet na i kamap olsem dispela liklik pikinini, dispela man bai i gat biknem tru long kingdom bilong heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whoever receives one such little child in my name receives me,

block.text: "Na sapos wanpela man i tingting long mi na i helpim wanpela liklik pikinini olsem dispela pikinini, orait em i helpim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: but whoever causes one of these little ones who believe in me to stumble, it would be better for him that a huge millstone should be hung around his neck, and that he should be sunk in the depths of the sea.”

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Sapos wanpela man i mekim wanpela bilong ol dispela liklik pikinini i bilip long mi i pundaun long sin, orait mobeta ol man i pasim wanpela bikpela ston long nek bilong dispela man na tromoi em i go daun tru long solwara na bai em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe to the world because of occasions of stumbling! For it must be that the occasions come, but woe to that person through whom the occasion comes!

block.text: "Sori tumas long ol man bilong dispela graun, ol i wok long mekim ol arapela i pundaun long sin. Tru, dispela pasin nogut bai i kamap. Tasol sori tru long man i mekim em i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If your hand or your foot causes you to stumble, cut it off, and cast it from you. It is better for you to enter into life maimed or crippled, rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into the eternal fire.

block.text: Sapos han bilong yu o lek bilong yu i pulim yu long mekim sin, orait yu mas katim na tromoi i go. Mobeta yu gat wanpela han tasol, o wanpela lek tasol, na yu kisim laip bilong i stap oltaim. Nogut yu gat tupela han o tupela lek na ol i tromoi yu i go long paia i no save dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If your eye causes you to stumble, pluck it out, and cast it from you. It is better for you to enter into life with one eye, rather than having two eyes to be cast into the Gehenna of fire.

block.text: Na sapos ai bilong yu i pulim yu long mekim sin, orait yu mas kamautim na tromoi i go. Mobeta yu gat wanpela ai tasol na yu kisim laip bilong i stap oltaim. Nogut yu gat tupela ai na ol i tromoi yu i go long paia bilong hel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: See that you don’t despise one of these little ones, for I tell you that in heaven their angels always see the face of my Father who is in heaven.

block.text: See that you don't despise one of these little ones, for I tell you that in heaven their angels always see the face of my Father who is in heaven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the Son of Man came to save that which was lost.”

block.text: For the Son of Man came to save that which was lost.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What do you think? If a man has one hundred sheep, and one of them goes astray, doesn’t he leave the ninety-nine, go to the mountains, and seek that which has gone astray?

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Yupela i ting wanem? Sapos wanpela man i gat 100 sipsip, na sapos wanpela sipsip i lus, ating bai em i no wok long painim, a? Nogat. Bai em i lusim ol 99 sipsip i stap long maunten, na bai em i go painim dispela wanpela sipsip i lus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If he finds it, most certainly I tell you, he rejoices over it more than over the ninety-nine which have not gone astray.

block.text: Mi tok tru long yupela, sapos em i kisim sipsip pinis, orait bai em i amamas moa yet. Em i save amamas long ol 99 sipsip i no bin lus, tasol taim em i kisim bek dispela wanpela sipsip i bin lus, amamas bilong en bai i moa moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so it is not the will of your Father who is in heaven that one of these little ones should perish.”

block.text: Olsem tasol Papa bilong yupela i stap long heven em i no laik bai wanpela bilong ol dispela liklik pikinini i lus."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If your brother sins against you, go, show him his fault between you and him alone. If he listens to you, you have gained back your brother.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Sapos brata bilong yu em i mekim rong long yu, orait yu go lukim em, na taim yutupela tasol i stap, yu mas traim stretim tok wantaim em. Sapos em i harim tok bilong yu, orait bai yu kisim bek brata bilong yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if he doesn’t listen, take one or two more with you, that at the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established.

block.text: Na sapos em i no harim tok bilong yu, orait yu mas kisim wanpela o tupela man moa i go wantaim yu. Olsem na bai i gat tupela o tripela man bilong strongim tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If he refuses to listen to them, tell it to the assembly. If he refuses to hear the assembly also, let him be to you as a Gentile or a tax collector.

block.text: Tasol sapos em i no laik harim tok bilong ol, orait yu mas tokim ol manmeri bilong sios. Na sapos em i no laik harim tok bilong ol tu, orait yu mas lukim em i olsem wanpela haiden na olsem man bilong kisim takis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, whatever things you bind on earth will have been bound in heaven, and whatever things you release on earth will have been released in heaven.

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, olgeta samting yupela i pasim long graun, em bai God i pasim long heven. Na olgeta samting yupela i lusim long graun, em bai God i lusim long heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again, assuredly I tell you, that if two of you will agree on earth concerning anything that they will ask, it will be done for them by my Father who is in heaven.

block.text: "Na mi tok moa long yupela. Sapos tupela bilong yupela hia long graun i wanbel long wanpela samting na yutupela i beten long kisim dispela samting, orait Papa bilong mi em i stap long heven em bai i givim long yutupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there I am in their midst.”

block.text: Sapos tupela o tripela man i kam bung long nem bilong mi, orait mi yet mi stap namel long ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Peter came and said to him,

block.text: Long dispela taim Pita i kam long Jisas na i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, how often shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? Until seven times?”

block.text: "Bikpela, hamas taim brata bilong mi i ken mekim rong long mi, na mi mas lusim rong bilong en? Ating inap long 7 -pela taim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I tell you, not seven times, but, seventy times seven.

block.text: "Mi no tok long yu mas lusim rong bilong en inap 7 -pela taim tasol. Nogat. Mi tok, yu mas lusim inap 7 taims 7 -pela taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore the Kingdom of Heaven is like a certain king, who wanted to reconcile accounts with his servants.

block.text: "Harim. Kingdom bilong heven em i olsem wanpela king, em i laik bai ol wokboi bilong en i kam stretim dinau wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had begun to reconcile, one was brought to him who owed him ten thousand talents.

block.text: Em i statim wok bilong stretim dinau, na ol i bringim wanpela man i kam long em, em i gat dinau inap 10 milion kina.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But because he couldn’t pay, his lord commanded him to be sold, with his wife, his children, and all that he had, and payment to be made.

block.text: Tasol em i no gat mani inap long bekim dispela dinau. Olsem na king i tok long ol i mas salim dispela man wantaim meri pikinini bilong en, bai ol i kamap wokboi nating bilong narapela man. Na ol i mas salim tu olgeta samting bilong en, na long dispela pasin ol i mas kisim mani bilong bekim dinau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The servant therefore fell down and worshipped him before him, saying, ‘Lord, have patience with me, and I will repay you all!’

block.text: Wokboi i harim dispela tok na em i brukim skru klostu long lek bilong king na i tokim king olsem, 'Yu mas sori long mi na wetim mi. Bai mi bekim olgeta dinau mi bin kisim long yu.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: The lord of that servant, being moved with compassion, released him, and forgave him the debt.”

block.text: Na bikman bilong dispela wokboi em i sori long en na i lusim em, na i lusim dinau bilong en tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But that servant went out, and found one of his fellow servants, who owed him one hundred denarii, and he grabbed him, and took him by the throat, saying, ‘Pay me what you owe!’”

block.text: "Orait dispela wokboi i go ausait na i lukim wanpela wanwok bilong en, em i gat dinau long em inap 10 kina tasol. Na em i holimpas dispela wanwok na i pasim strong nek bilong en, na i tokim em olsem, 'Yu mas bekim olgeta dispela dinau yu bin kisim long mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “So his fellow servant fell down at his feet and begged him, saying, ‘Have patience with me, and I will repay you!’

block.text: "Wanwok bilong en i harim dispela tok na em i brukim skru na tokim dispela man olsem, 'Yu mas sori long mi na wetim mi. Bai mi bekim dinau mi bin kisim long yu.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: He would not, but went and cast him into prison, until he should pay back that which was due.

block.text: Tasol dispela man em i no laik. Nogat. Em i go putim wanwok i stap long kalabus inap em i bekim dinau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So when his fellow servants saw what was done, they were exceedingly sorry, and came and told to their lord all that was done.

block.text: "Ol arapela wanwok bilong dispela man i lukim dispela pasin em i mekim na ol i bel nogut tru. Na ol i go tokim bikman bilong ol long olgeta pasin dispela wokboi i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then his lord called him in, and said to him, ‘You wicked servant! I forgave you all that debt, because you begged me.

block.text: Olsem na dispela bikman i singautim dispela wokboi na i tokim em olsem, 'Yu wokboi nogut. Pastaim yu krai long mi, na mi lusim olgeta dinau bilong yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Shouldn’t you also have had mercy on your fellow servant, even as I had mercy on you?’

block.text: Mi bin sori long yu. Olsem na watpo yu no sori tu long wanwok bilong yu?'

ReferenceBlocks.text: His lord was angry, and delivered him to the tormentors, until he should pay all that was due to him.

block.text: Na bikman bilong en i belhat na i putim em long han bilong ol man bilong givim pen long em, inap em i bekim olgeta dinau bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So my heavenly Father will also do to you, if you don’t each forgive your brother from your hearts for his misdeeds.”

block.text: "Olsem tasol Papa bilong mi i stap long heven, em bai i mekim wankain pasin tasol long yupela sapos yupela i no lusim tru ol rong ol brata i mekim long yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 19
It happened when Jesus had finished these words, he departed from Galilee, and came into the borders of Judea beyond the Jordan.

block.text: Jisas i pinisim ol dispela tok, na em i lusim distrik Galili na i go long distrik Judia long hapsait bilong wara Jordan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Great multitudes followed him, and he healed them there.

block.text: Na ol bikpela lain manmeri ol i bihainim em. Na long dispela hap em i mekim orait sik bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pharisees came to him, testing him, and saying,

block.text: Na ol Farisi i kam long Jisas na ol i laik traim em. Olsem na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Is it lawful for a man to divorce his wife for any reason?”

block.text: "Ating lo bilong yumi i orait long man i ken rausim meri long laik bilong em yet?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Haven’t you read that he who made them from the beginning made them male and female?

block.text: "Ating yupela i no bin ritim tok i stap long buk bilong God? Dispela tok i tok olsem, 'Bipo tru taim God i wokim olgeta samting, em i wokim ol manmeri, na em i mekim ol i kamap man na meri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said, ‘For this cause a man shall leave his father and mother, and shall join to his wife; and the two shall become one flesh?’

block.text: Na God i tok, "Olsem na man i save lusim papamama na i pas wantaim meri bilong en, na tupela i kamap wanpela bodi tasol.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: So that they are no more two, but one flesh. What therefore God has joined together, don’t let man tear apart.”

block.text: God i tok olsem na tupela i no i stap olsem tupela moa. Nogat. Tupela i kamap olsem wanpela bodi. Olsem na samting God i pasim pinis, em man i no ken katim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They asked him,

block.text: Na ol Farisi i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why then did Moses command us to give her a bill of divorce, and divorce her?”

block.text: "Orait olsem wanem Moses i givim lo long yumi na i tok man i ken raitim pepa bilong katim marit na givim long meri na rausim em i go?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Moses, because of the hardness of your hearts, allowed you to divorce your wives, but from the beginning it has not been so.

block.text: "Yupela i man bilong bikhet, olsem na Moses i larim yupela i rausim meri. Tasol bipo tru i no gat dispela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I tell you that whoever divorces his wife, except for sexual immorality, and marries another, commits adultery; and he who marries her when she is divorced commits adultery.”

block.text: Mi tok olsem long yupela. Sapos meri bilong wanpela man em i no bin mekim pasin pamuk, na man i rausim em na i maritim narapela meri, dispela man yet em i mekim pasin pamuk."

ReferenceBlocks.text: His disciples said to him,

block.text: Ol disaipel i harim dispela tok na ol i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If this is the case of the man with his wife, it is not good to marry.”

block.text: "Sapos man i mas bihainim dispela kain pasin na i stap wantaim meri bilong en, orait mobeta man i no marit."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Not all men can receive this saying, but those to whom it is given.

block.text: "I no olgeta man ol inap long kisim dispela tok. Nogat. God i bin givim strong long sampela man tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For there are eunuchs who were born that way from their mother’s womb, and there are eunuchs who were made eunuchs by men; and there are eunuchs who made themselves eunuchs for the Kingdom of Heaven’s sake. He who is able to receive it, let him receive it.”

block.text: Harim. I gat kain kain man i stap ol i no save marit. Sampela, bodi bilong ol i bagarap long taim mama i bin karim ol. Na sampela ol man i bin katim na ol i no inap long kamapim pikinini. Na sampela i bin ting long mekim wok bilong kingdom bilong heven na ol i tambuim ol yet na ol i no save marit. Tasol man em inap long kisim dispela tok, em i ken kisim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then little children were brought to him, that he should lay his hands on them and pray; and the disciples rebuked them.
But Jesus said,

block.text: Long dispela taim ol manmeri i bringim ol liklik pikinini I kam long Jisas. Ol i laik bai em i putim han antap long ol na mekim prea. Tasol ol disaipel i krosim ol dispela manmeri.
Na Jisas I tokim ol disaipel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Allow the little children, and don’t forbid them to come to me; for the Kingdom of Heaven belongs to ones like these.”

block.text: "Yupela larim ol pikinini i kam long mi. Yupela i no ken pasim ol. Nogat. Kingdom bilong heven em i bilong kain man olsem ol dispela pikinini."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He laid his hands on them, and departed from there.

block.text: Na em i putim han antap long ol pikinini. Na bihain em i lusim dispela hap na i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, one came to him and said,

block.text: Orait wanpela man i kam long Jisas na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Good teacher, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?”

block.text: "Tisa, mi mas mekim wanem gutpela pasin na bai mi kisim laip i stap gut oltaim oltaim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you call me good? No one is good but one, that is, God. But if you want to enter into life, keep the commandments.”

block.text: "Bilong wanem yu askim mi long ol gutpela pasin? Wanpela tasol em i gutpela. Tasol sapos yu laik kisim laip i stap gut oltaim, orait yu mas bihainim ol lo bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to him,

block.text: Na dispela man i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Which ones?”

block.text: "Yu tok long wanem ol lo?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said,

block.text: Na Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “‘You shall not murder.’ ‘You shall not commit adultery.’ ‘You shall not steal.’ ‘You shall not offer false testimony.’

block.text: "Ol dispela lo i gat tok olsem, 'Yupela i no ken kilim i dai ol arapela manmeri. Yupela ol marit, yupela i no ken mekim pasin pamuk. Yupela i no ken stil. Yupela i no ken giaman na kotim nating ol arapela manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ‘Honor your father and mother.’ And, ‘You shall love your neighbor as yourself.’”

block.text: Yupela i mas aninit long papamama bilong yupela na bihainim tok bilong ol. Na yu mas laikim tru ol wantok olsem yu laikim yu yet.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: The young man said to him,

block.text: Na yangpela man i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “All these things I have observed from my youth. What do I still lack?”

block.text: "Mi save bihainim tasol dispela olgeta lo. Tasol mi sot yet long wanem samting?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you want to be perfect, go, sell what you have, and give to the poor, and you will have treasure in heaven; and come, follow me.”

block.text: "Sapos yu laik kamap stretpela olgeta, orait yu go salim olgeta samting bilong yu na dispela mani yu kisim yu mas givim long ol rabisman. Yu mekim olsem, na bai yu gat ol gutpela samting tru long heven. Na yu kam bihainim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when the young man heard the saying, he went away sad, for he was one who had great possessions.
Jesus said to his disciples,

block.text: Dispela yangpela man i harim dispela tok, na bel bilong en i hevi, na em i go. Long wanem, em i gat planti samting tru.
Na Jisas i tokim ol disaipel bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I say to you, a rich man will enter into the Kingdom of Heaven with difficulty.

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, ol maniman bai i hatwok tru long i go insait long kingdom bilong heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again I tell you, it is easier for a camel to go through a needle’s eye, than for a rich man to enter into the Kingdom of God.”

block.text: Mi tokim yupela gen, kamel i laik i go insait long hul bilong nil bilong samap, em i no gat hatwok olsem maniman i laik i go insait long kingdom bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the disciples heard it, they were exceedingly astonished, saying,

block.text: Ol disaipel i harim dispela tok na ol i kirap nogut tru. Na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who then can be saved?”

block.text: "Sapos i olsem, orait husat inap kisim laip i stap gut oltaim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Looking at them, Jesus said,

block.text: Na Jisas i lukluk stret long ol, na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “With men this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.”

block.text: "Ol man i no inap. Tasol God em inap long mekim olgeta samting."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Peter answered,

block.text: Em i tok olsem, na Pita i bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, we have left everything, and followed you. What then will we have?”

block.text: "Lukim. Mipela i bin lusim olgeta samting na bihainim yu. Bai mipela i kisim wanem samting?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you that you who have followed me, in the regeneration when the Son of Man will sit on the throne of his glory, you also will sit on twelve thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel.

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, long taim olgeta samting i kamap nupela, na Pikinini Bilong Man bai i gat biknem na i sindaun long sia king bilong en, long dispela taim yupela ol man i bin bihainim mi yupela tu bai i sindaun long 12 -pela gutpela sia na yupela bai i bosim ol 12 -pela lain bilong Israel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Everyone who has left houses, or brothers, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my name’s sake, will receive one hundred times, and will inherit eternal life.

block.text: Na olgeta manmeri i bin ting long nem bilong mi na i lusim haus o brata o susa o papa o mama o pikinini o gaden, bai ol i kisim 100 moa, na bai ol i kisim laip i stap gut oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But many who are first will be last, and many who are last will be first.”

block.text: Tasol planti man nau ol i stap namba wan, ol bai i stap las tru. Na planti man nau ol i stap las, ol bai i stap namba wan."

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 20
“For the Kingdom of Heaven is like a man who was the master of a household, who went out early in the morning to hire laborers for his vineyard.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Mi mekim dispela tok long ol man bai i stap namba wan, long wanem, kingdom bilong heven em i olsem wanpela man i gat planti graun. Long moningtaim tru em i go bilong kisim ol wokboi long wok long gaden wain bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had agreed with the laborers for a denarius a day, he sent them into his vineyard.

block.text: Ol dispela wokboi i orait long kisim wan kina wan kina long dispela de, na bikman i salim ol i go wok long gaden wain bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went out about the third hour, and saw others standing idle in the marketplace.

block.text: Orait long 9 klok samting bikman i go na em i lukim ol man i sanap nating i stap long ples bung.

ReferenceBlocks.text: To them he said, ‘You also go into the vineyard, and whatever is right I will give you.’ So they went their way.

block.text: Na em i tokim ol olsem, 'Yupela tu i ken i go wok long gaden wain, na bai mi givim pe long yupela inap long wok yupela i mekim.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again he went out about the sixth and the ninth hour, and did likewise.

block.text: Na ol i go. Na long belo na long 3 klok long apinun, bikman i go gen na i mekim wankain pasin tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: About the eleventh hour he went out, and found others standing idle. He said to them, ‘Why do you stand here all day idle?’”

block.text: "Orait long 5 klok samting long apinun em i go na i lukim ol arapela man i sanap nating i stap. Na em i askim ol olsem, 'Olsem wanem na yupela i sanap nating hia long dispela san olgeta?'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “They said to him, ‘Because no one has hired us.’” “He said to them, ‘You also go into the vineyard, and you will receive whatever is right.’

block.text: Na ol i bekim tok olsem, 'I no gat wanpela man i givim wok long mipela.' Na bikman i tokim ol, 'Yupela tu i ken i go wok long gaden wain bilong mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: When evening had come, the lord of the vineyard said to his manager, ‘Call the laborers and pay them their wages, beginning from the last to the first.’”

block.text: "Apinun pinis, orait papa bilong gaden wain i tokim bosboi bilong en olsem, 'Yu singautim ol wokboi na givim pe long ol. Yu stat long ol wokboi i bin kamap bihain tru, na yu givim pe long wan wan bilong ol i go inap long ol wokboi i bin kam paslain.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “When those who were hired at about the eleventh hour came, they each received a denarius.

block.text: Orait ol man i bin stat wok long 5 klok long apinun, ol i kam na ol i kisim wan kina wan kina.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the first came, they supposed that they would receive more; and they likewise each received a denarius.

block.text: Na taim ol man i bin stat wok paslain tru ol i kam, ol i ting ol bai i kisim planti mani moa. Tasol nogat. Ol tu ol i kisim wan kina wan kina tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they received it, they murmured against the master of the household,
saying, ‘These last have spent one hour, and you have made them equal to us, who have borne the burden of the day and the scorching heat!’”

block.text: Ol i lukim mani ol i kisim, na ol i tok kros long papa bilong gaden

olsem, 'Dispela ol man i kamap bihain tru, ol i wok wan aua tasol, na yu givim ol wankain pe olsem pe bilong mipela. Tasol mipela i bin hatwok tru stat long moningtaim tru i kam inap nau, na san i kukim nogut mipela.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But he answered one of them, ‘Friend, I am doing you no wrong. Didn’t you agree with me for a denarius?

block.text: "Papa bilong gaden i harim dispela tok na em i bekim tok olsem long wanpela bilong ol dispela wokboi, 'Pren, mi no mekim rong long yu. Ating pastaim mitupela i bin orait long mak bilong wan kina, o nogat?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Take that which is yours, and go your way. It is my desire to give to this last just as much as to you.

block.text: Yu kisim pe bilong yu na yu go. Long laik bilong mi tasol, na mi givim wankain pe long dispela man i kam bihain tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Isn’t it lawful for me to do what I want to with what I own? Or is your eye evil, because I am good?’

block.text: Em i samting bilong mi. Ating mi no inap bihainim laik bilong mi yet na tilim mani bilong mi, a? Sapos mi laik mekim gutpela pasin long ol dispela man, orait watpo yu bel nogut?'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: So the last will be first, and the first last. For many are called, but few are chosen.”

block.text: Na Jisas i tok, "Olsem tasol ol man i bin i stap las tru ol bai i stap namba wan. Na ol man i stap namba wan, ol bai i stap las tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As Jesus was going up to Jerusalem, he took the twelve disciples aside, and on the way he said to them,

block.text: Jisas i wokabaut i go long Jerusalem. Na em i kisim ol 12 -pela disaipel tasol i go long wanpela hap na taim ol i wokabaut yet Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, we are going up to Jerusalem, and the Son of Man will be delivered to the chief priests and scribes, and they will condemn him to death,

block.text: "Harim. Nau yumi go long Jerusalem. Na bai ol i givim Pikinini Bilong Man long han bilong ol bikpris na ol saveman bilong lo. Na bai ol i mekim kot long em na pasim tok long kilim em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and will hand him over to the Gentiles to mock, to scourge, and to crucify; and the third day he will be raised up.”

block.text: Na bai ol i givim em long ol man bilong ol arapela lain, bai ol dispela lain i ken tok bilas long em na wipim em na nilim em long diwai kros. Na long de namba 3 bai em i kirap bek."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the mother of the sons of Zebedee came to him with her sons, worshipping him and asking a certain thing of him.
He said to her,

block.text: Bihain mama bilong tupela pikinini bilong Sebedi wantaim tupela pikinini bilong en, ol i kam long Jisas. Na em i brukim skru na i tok olsem em i laik askim Jisas long wanpela samting.
Na Jisas i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What do you want?”

block.text: "Yu laikim wanem samting?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: She said to him,

block.text: Na dispela meri I tokim Jisas olsem,

block.characterId: mother of the sons of Zebedee (James and John)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: mother of the sons of Zebedee (James and John)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Command that these, my two sons, may sit, one on your right hand, and one on your left hand, in your Kingdom.”

block.text: "Mi laik bai yu tok olsem dispela tupela pikinini bilong mi i ken sindaun klostu long yu long kingdom bilong yu, narapela long han sut na narapela long han kais."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus answered,

block.text: Jisas i harim dispela tok na em i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You don’t know what you are asking. Are you able to drink the cup that I am about to drink, and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with?”

block.text: "Yupela i no save gut long dispela samting yupela i askim mi long en. Ating yutupela inap dring long dispela kap mi bai dring long en?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him,

block.text: Na tupela i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We are able.”

block.text: "Mitupela inap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You will indeed drink my cup, and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with, but to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it is for whom it has been prepared by my Father.”

block.text: "Tru, yutupela bai i dring long kap bilong mi. Tasol husat bai i sindaun long han sut na long han kais bilong mi, dispela em i no samting bilong mi long makim. Nogat. Dispela ol sia ol i bilong ol man Papa bilong mi i redim pinis bilong ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the ten heard it, they were indignant with the two brothers.

block.text: Taim ol 10 -pela disaipel i harim tok long samting tupela brata i bin askim Jisas, ol i kros long tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus summoned them, and said,

block.text: Tasol Jisas I singautim ol i kam long em, na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You know that the rulers of the nations lord it over them, and their great ones exercise authority over them.

block.text: "Yupela i save, ol king bilong ol arapela lain i save bosim tru ol lain bilong ol. Na ol bikman bilong ol i save strong tumas long ol manmeri i mas bihainim tok bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It shall not be so among you, but whoever desires to become great among you shall be your servant.

block.text: Tasol dispela pasin i no ken i stap namel long yupela. Nogat. Man i laik i stap bikman namel long yupela, em i mas i stap wokman bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whoever desires to be first among you shall be your bondservant.

block.text: Na man i laik i stap namba wan bilong yupela, em i mas i stap olsem wokboi nating bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the Son of Man came not to be served, but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.”

block.text: Olsem tasol Pikinini Bilong Man i no bin i kam bilong ol man i kenmekim wok bilong helpim em. Nogat. Em i kam bilong helpim ol, na bilong givim laip bilong em bilong baim bek planti manmeri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As they went out from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.

block.text: Jisas wantaim ol disaipel bilong en i lusim taun Jeriko na i go. Na planti manmeri moa i bihainim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, two blind men sitting by the road, when they heard that Jesus was passing by, cried out,

block.text: Na tupela man i sindaun i stap arere long rot. Tupela i aipas, na taim tupela i harim tok long Jisas i wokabaut i kam, tupela i singaut strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, have mercy on us, you son of David!”

block.text: "Yu Pikinini Bilong Devit, yu mas sori long mitupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitude rebuked them, saying:

block.text: Ol manmeri I harim tupela i singaut na ol i tok strong long tupela

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Be quiet!”

block.text: i mas pasim maus,

ReferenceBlocks.text: but they cried out even louder,

block.text: tasol tupela i singaut bikmaus moa yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, have mercy on us, you son of David!”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu Pikinini Bilong Devit, yu mas sori long mitupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus stood still, and called them, and asked,

block.text: Orait Jisas i sanap na i singautim tupela na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What do you want me to do for you?”

block.text: "Yutupela i laik bai mi mekim wanem long yutupela?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They told him,

block.text: Na tupela i bekim tok bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, that our eyes may be opened.”

block.text: "Bikpela, mitupela i laik bai yu opim ai bilong mitupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus, being moved with compassion, touched their eyes; and immediately their eyes received their sight, and they followed him.

block.text: Na Jisas i sori long tupela, na em i putim han long ai bilong tupela, na wantu tasol ai bilong tupela i orait na tupela i lukluk gen. Na tupela i bihainim Jisas i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 21
When they drew near to Jerusalem, and came to Bethsphage, to the Mount of Olives, then Jesus sent two disciples,
saying to them,

block.text: Jisas wantaim ol disaipel bilong en i kamap klostu long Jerusalem, na ol i kamap long ples Betfage long maunten Oliv. Na Jisas i salim tupela disaipel
na em i tokim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Go into the village that is opposite you, and immediately you will find a donkey tied, and a colt with her. Untie them, and bring them to me.

block.text: "Yutupela go long dispela ples nau yumi lukluk long en. Na wantu bai yutupela i lukim wanpela donki ol i pasim i stap, na pikinini bilong en i stap wantaim em. Lusim rop na bringim tupela i kam long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone says anything to you, you shall say, ‘The Lord needs them,’ and immediately he will send them.”

block.text: Na sapos wanpela man i mekim wanpela tok long yutupela, orait yutupela i mas tok olsem, 'Bikpela i gat wok long tupela. Na kwiktaim bai em i salim tupela i kam bek.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: All this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken through the prophet, saying,

block.text: Dispela samting i kamap bilong inapim dispela tok profet i bin mekim bipo,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Tell the daughter of Zion, behold, your King comes to you, humble, and riding on a donkey, on a colt, the foal of a donkey.”

block.text: "Autim dispela tok long ol manmeri bilong Saion, 'Lukim. King bilong yupela em i kam nau. Em i kam olsem man i no gat nem, na em i sindaun antap long wanpela donki. Em I sindaun long yangpela donki na i kam.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: The disciples went, and did just as Jesus commanded them.

block.text: Orait tupela disaipel i go mekim olsem Jisas i bin tokim tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They brought the donkey and the colt, and laid their clothes on them; and he sat on them.

block.text: Tupela i bringim donki mama wantaim pikinini bilong en, na tupela i putim longpela klos bilong tupela antap long tupela donki. Na Jisas i sindaun antap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A very great multitude spread their clothes on the road. Others cut branches from the trees, and spread them on the road.

block.text: Na planti man ol i rausim longpela klos bilong ol na lainim long rot. Na sampela i katim ol han bilong diwai na putim long rot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitudes who went before him, and who followed kept shouting,

block.text: Na ol manmeri i wokabaut i go paslain long Jisas wantaim ol manmeri i wokabaut i kam bihain, olgeta i wok long singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hosanna to the son of David! Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord! Hosanna in the highest!”

block.text: "Amamas long Pikinini Bilong Devit. God i ken mekim gut long dispela man i kam long nem bilong Bikpela. Litimapim nem bilong God Antap Tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had come into Jerusalem, all the city was stirred up, saying,

block.text: Jisas i go insait long Jerusalem, na olgeta manmeri bilong taun i kirap nogut na i askim nabaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who is this?”

block.text: "Dispela man em i husat tru?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitudes said,

block.text: Na ol manmeri i wokabaut ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is the prophet, Jesus, from Nazareth of Galilee.”

block.text: "Em Jisas, em profet i kam long taun Nasaret long Galili."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus entered into the temple of God, and drove out all of those who sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the money changers’ tables and the seats of those who sold the doves.
He said to them,

block.text: Jisas i go insait long banis bilong tempel na em i rausim olgeta man i mekim wok bisnis i stap long dispela hap. Em i kapsaitim ol tebol bilong ol man i wok long senisim mani, wantaim ol sia bilong ol man i wok long salim ol pisin.
Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is written, ‘My house shall be called a house of prayer,’ but you have made it a den of robbers!”

block.text: "Buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, 'Haus bilong mi bai i stap haus bilong beten.' Tasol yupela i mekim em i kamap olsem ples hait bilong ol stilman."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The blind and the lame came to him in the temple, and he healed them.

block.text: Jisas i stap insait long tempel, na ol aipas na lek nogut i kam long em, na em i mekim ol i kamap orait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when the chief priests and the scribes saw the wonderful things that he did, and the children who were crying out in the temple and saying,

block.text: Tasol ol bikpris na ol saveman bilong lo i lukim ol mirakel em i wokim, na ol i harim ol pikinini i singaut insait long banis bilong tempel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hosanna to the son of David!”

block.text: "Amamas long Pikinini Bilong Devit."

ReferenceBlocks.text: they were indignant,
and said to him,

block.text: Olsem na ol i bel nogut
na ol i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you hear what these are saying?”

block.text: "Ating yu harim dispela tok ol i mekim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes. Did you never read, ‘Out of the mouth of babes and nursing babies you have perfected praise?’”

block.text: "Yes, mi harim. Tasol ating yupela I no bin ritim dispela tok, 'Ol liklik pikinini i save litimapim nem bilong yu.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He left them, and went out of the city to Bethany, and lodged there.

block.text: Na em i lusim ol na i go ausait long taun, na em i go i stap long Betani long dispela nait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now in the morning, as he returned to the city, he was hungry.

block.text: Long moningtaim tru Jisas i wokabaut i go bek long taun, na em i hangre.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Seeing a fig tree by the road, he came to it, and found nothing on it but leaves. He said to it,

block.text: Em i lukim wanpela diwai fik i stap long arere bilong rot, na em i go klostu long en. Tasol em i no lukim wanpela kaikai i stap long en. Nogat. Ol lip tasol i stap. Na em i tokim diwai fik olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let there be no fruit from you forever!”

block.text: "Yu no ken karim kaikai moa. Nogat tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately the fig tree withered away.
When the disciples saw it, they marveled, saying,

block.text: Na kwiktaim tumas dispela diwai fik i drai.
Ol disaipel i lukim dispela, na ol i kirap nogut. Ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How did the fig tree immediately wither away?”

block.text: "Olsem wanem na diwai fik i drai kwik tumas?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you, if you have faith, and don’t doubt, you will not only do what was done to the fig tree, but even if you told this mountain, ‘Be taken up and cast into the sea,’ it would be done.

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, sapos yupela i bilip tru, na yupela i no gat tupela tingting, orait bai yupela inap mekim wankain pasin olsem mi mekim long dispela diwai fik. Na bai yupela i no mekim dispela tasol. Nogat. Sapos yupela i tokim dispela maunten, 'Yu kirap na yu kalap i go daun long solwara,' orait dispela samting bai i kamap olsem yupela i tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All things, whatever you ask in prayer, believing, you will receive.”

block.text: Na sapos yupela i bilip na mekim prea, orait olgeta samting yupela i beten long kisim, em bai yupela i kisim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had come into the temple, the chief priests and the elders of the people came to him as he was teaching, and said,

block.text: Jisas i go insait long banis bilong tempel na i skulim ol manmeri. Na ol bikpris wantaim ol hetman bilong ol Israel ol i kam long em na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “By what authority do you do these things? Who gave you this authority?”

block.text: "Yu kisim dispela namba na strong we na yu mekim ol dispela samting? Husat i givim dispela namba long yu na I tokim yu long mekim dispela wok?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I also will ask you one question. If you tell me, I will tell you by what authority I do these things.

block.text: "Mi tu mi laik askim yupela long wanpela samting. Na sapos yupela i bekim stret askim bilong mi, orait bai mi tokim yupela long husat i givim mi namba bilong mekim dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The baptism of John, where was it from? From heaven or from men?”

block.text: Taim Jon i baptaisim ol man, em i kisim dispela pasin we? Em i samting bilong heven, o em i samting bilong ol man tasol?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They reasoned with themselves, saying,

block.text: Orait ol i tok-tok long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If we say, ‘From heaven,’ he will ask us, ‘Why then did you not believe him?’

block.text: "Sapos yumi tok, `Em i samting bilong heven,' em bai i askim yumi olsem, `Orait bilong wanem yupela i no bin bilip long em?'

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if we say, ‘From men,’ we fear the multitude, for all hold John as a prophet.”

block.text: Na sapos yumi tok, Em i samting bilong ol man tasol,' orait yumi mas pret long ol manmeri, long wanem, olgeta i ting Jon em i profet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They answered Jesus, and said,

block.text: Olsem na ol i bekim tok bilong Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We don’t know.”

block.text: "Mipela i no save."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He also said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Neither will I tell you by what authority I do these things.

block.text: "Mi tu mi no ken tokim yupela long husat i givim mi namba na mi mekim dispela wok."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But what do you think? A man had two sons, and he came to the first, and said, ‘Son, go work today in my vineyard.’

block.text: Jisas i tokim ol bikpris wantaim ol hetman moa olsem, "Orait yupela i ting wanem? Wanpela man i gat tupela pikinini. Em i go long namba wan pikinini na i tokim em olsem, 'Pikinini, nau yu go wok long gaden wain.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered, ‘I will not,’ but afterward he changed his mind, and went.

block.text: Na pikinini i tok, 'Mi no laik.' Tasol bihain em i senisim tingting na i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came to the second, and said the same thing. He answered, ‘I go, sir,’ but he didn’t go.

block.text: Na papa i go long narapela pikinini na i mekim wankain tok long em. Na pikinini i tok, 'Yes, papa.' Tasol em i no i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Which one of the two did the will of his father?”

block.text: Orait long dispela tupela pikinini, husat i bihainim laik bilong papa?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him,

block.text: Na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The first.”

block.text: "Namba wan."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you that the tax collectors and the prostitutes are entering into the Kingdom of God before you.

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, ol man bilong kisim takis na ol pamukmeri i save go insait long kingdom bilong God paslain long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For John came to you in the way of righteousness, and you didn’t believe him, but the tax collectors and the prostitutes believed him. When you saw it, you didn’t even repent afterward, that you might believe him.”

block.text: Long wanem, Jon i bin kamap long yupela na i soim stretpela pasin long yupela, na yupela i no bilip long em. Tasol ol man bilong kisim takis na ol pamukmeri ol i bin bilip long em. Na yupela i lukim dispela pinis, tasol yupela i no senisim tingting na bilip long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hear another parable. There was a man who was a master of a household, who planted a vineyard, set a hedge about it, dug a winepress in it, built a tower, leased it out to farmers, and went into another country.

block.text: Jisas I tokim ol bikman moa olsem, "Yupela harim narapela tok piksa. Wanpela man i bin wokim wanpela gaden wain, na i banisim. Na insait long gaden em i wokim hul olsem tang bilong krungutim na memeim ol pikinini wain, na em i wokim haus bilong ol man i ken i stap na was long gaden. Na em i putim dispela gaden long han bilong sampela man i laik wok bisnis long en. Na em i go long wanpela longwe ples.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the season for the fruit drew near, he sent his servants to the farmers, to receive his fruit.

block.text: Orait klostu long taim bilong ol diwai wain i karim kaikai, em i salim ol wokboi i go long gaden wain bilong kisim ol pikinini wain bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The farmers took his servants, beat one, killed another, and stoned another.

block.text: Tasol ol man i wok long gaden ol i kisim ol wokboi bilong en, na ol i paitim narapela na kilim i dai narapela na tromoi ston long narapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again, he sent other servants more than the first: and they treated them the same way.

block.text: Na bihain papa bilong gaden i salim ol arapela wokboi i go long ol. Em i salim planti liklik, i winim namba em i bin salim bipo. Na ol man i wok long gaden ol i mekim wankain pasin tasol long ol dispela wokboi tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But afterward he sent to them his son, saying, ‘They will respect my son.’

block.text: "Orait bihain papa bilong gaden i salim pikinini man bilong em yet i go long ol. Papa i tok olsem, 'Bai ol i harim tok bilong pikinini bilong mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the farmers, when they saw the son, said among themselves, ‘This is the heir. Come, let’s kill him, and seize his inheritance.’

block.text: Tasol ol man i wok long gaden ol i lukim pikinini bilong en i kam, na ol i toktok namel long ol yet olsem, 'Dispela man hia bai i kisim olgeta samting bilong papa bilong en. Goan, yumi kilim em i dai, na bai yumi kisim dispela gaden bilong em.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: So they took him, and threw him out of the vineyard, and killed him.

block.text: Olsem na ol i holimpas em na rausim em i go ausait long gaden, na ol i kilim em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When therefore the lord of the vineyard comes, what will he do to those farmers?”

block.text: Orait yupela i ting wanem? Bihain papa bilong gaden wain bai i kam na mekim wanem pasin long ol dispela man i wok long gaden?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They told him,

block.text: Na ol i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He will destroy those miserable men, and will lease out the vineyard to other farmers, who will give him the fruit in its season.”

block.text: "Em bai i bagarapim nogut tru ol dispela man nogut. Na em bai i givim gaden wain long ol arapela lain man bilong lukautim, na long taim bilong kisim kaikai bai ol i bungim kaikai na givim long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i askim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Did you never read in the Scriptures, ‘The stone which the builders rejected, the same was made the head of the corner. This was from the Lord. It is marvelous in our eyes?’”

block.text: "Ating yupela i no bin ritim dispela hap tok i stap long buk bilong God? Dispela tok i olsem, 'Dispela ston ol kamda i ting em i nogut na ol i rausim, nau em i kamap nambawan ston bilong strongim banis bilong haus. Bikpela yet i mekim dispela samting i kamap, na mipela i lukim em i gutpela tru.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Therefore I tell you, the Kingdom of God will be taken away from you, and will be given to a nation bringing forth its fruit.

block.text: Olsem na mi tokim yupela, God bai i rausim kingdom bilong en long han bilong yupela, na givim long wanpela lain manmeri ol i save kamapim kaikai bilong dispela kingdom.
