ReferenceBlocks.text: He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but on whomever it will fall, it will scatter him as dust.”

block.text: Na man i pundaun antap long dispela ston, em bai i bruk olgeta. Na sapos dispela ston i pundaun antap long wanpela man, ston bai I bagarapim em olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the chief priests and the Pharisees heard his parables, they perceived that he spoke about them.

block.text: Ol bikpris na ol Farisi i harim tok piksa Jisas i mekim, na ol i save, em i makim ol yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they sought to seize him, they said:

block.text: Olsem na ol I laik tru long holimpas Jisas,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We fear the people because they think he is a prophet.”

block.text: tasol ol i pret long ol manmeri, long wanem, ol manmeri i ting Jisas em i profet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 22
Jesus answered and spoke again in parables to them, saying,

block.text: Jisas i mekim narapela tok piksa gen long ol bikman olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Kingdom of Heaven is like a certain king, who made a marriage feast for his son.

block.text: "Kingdom bilong heven em i olsem pasin bilong wanpela king. Pikinini man bilong en i laik marit, na king i mekim bikpela kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He sent out his servants to call those who were invited to the marriage feast, but they would not come.

block.text: Pastaim em i tokim ol man long kam long kaikai bilong marit. Na long de bilong kaikai em i salim ol wokboi bilong en i go bilong singautim ol i kam. Tasol ol i no laik i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again he sent out other servants, saying, ‘Tell those who are invited, “Behold, I have prepared my dinner. My cattle and my fatlings are killed, and all things are ready. Come to the marriage feast!”’”

block.text: Na em i salim sampela wokboi moa, na em i tokim ol olsem, 'Yupela go long ol man mi bin singautim ol, na yupela tokim ol olsem, "Harim. Mi redim pinis kaikai bilong mi. Ol bulmakau man na ol patpela abus bilong mi, mipela i kilim pinis. Na olgeta samting i redi i stap. Yupela kam long kaikai bilong marit.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But they made light of it, and went their ways, one to his own farm, another to his merchandise.

block.text: "Ol wokboi i go givim dispela tok long ol dispela man, tasol ol i no laik harim, na ol i go nabaut. Narapela i go long gaden bilong en, na narapela i go mekim wok bisnis bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The rest grabbed his servants, and treated them shamefully, and killed them.

block.text: Tasol sampela i holimpas ol wokboi bilong king na i paitim ol nogut, na kilim ol i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the king heard that, he was angry, and sent his armies, destroyed those murderers, and burned their city.”

block.text: Olsem na king i belhat na i salim ol soldia bilong en i go pinisim tru ol dispela man i bin kilim ol wokboi i dai. Na ol i kukim ples bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Then he said to his servants, ‘The wedding is ready, but those who were invited weren’t worthy.

block.text: "Na king i tokim ol wokboi bilong en olsem, 'Kaikai bilong marit em i redi i stap, tasol ol man mi bin singautim ol, ol i no gutpela man inap long ol i kam long dispela kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Go therefore to the intersections of the highways, and as many as you may find, invite to the marriage feast.’”

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas i go long maus bilong olgeta rot, na olgeta man yupela i lukim, yupela i mas singautim ol i kam long kaikai bilong marit.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Those servants went out into the highways, and gathered together as many as they found, both bad and good. The wedding was filled with guests.

block.text: Em i tok olsem, na ol dispela wokboi i go nabaut long olgeta rot na bungim olgeta manmeri ol i lukim, ol man nogut wantaim ol gutpela man. Na ol i kam sindaun long kaikai na haus i pulap tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when the king came in to see the guests, he saw there a man who didn’t have on wedding clothing,

block.text: "Ol manmeri i sindaun i stap, na king i go insait bilong lukim ol. Na em i lukim wanpela man i no bin putim kain gutpela klos ol i save putim long de bilong marit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and he said to him, ‘Friend, how did you come in here not wearing wedding clothing?’ He was speechless.

block.text: Na king i askim em, 'Pren, olsem wanem na yu no putim gutpela klos na yu kam insait?' Tasol man i no gat tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the king said to the servants, ‘Bind him hand and foot, take him away, and throw him into the outer darkness; there is where the weeping and grinding of teeth will be.’

block.text: Orait na king i tokim ol wokman olsem, 'Yupela pasim lek han bilong en na tromoi em i go ausait bai em i stap long ples tudak. Long dispela ples tudak ol i save krai nogut na skrapim tit bilong ol.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: For many are called, but few chosen.”

block.text: "Harim. God i save singautim planti man, tasol em i save makim wanpela wanpela tasol bilong i kam insait."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the Pharisees went and took counsel how they might entrap him in his words.

block.text: Orait ol Farisi i go paitim tok bilong painim rot bilong kotim Jisas. Ol i ting long trikim Jisas long mekim sampela tok i no stret, bai ol i ken kotim em long tok bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They sent their disciples to him, along with the Herodians, saying,

block.text: Ol i salim ol disaipel bilong ol wantaim sampela man bilong lain bilong Herot, na ol i go long Jisas na tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Teacher, we know that you are honest, and teach the way of God in truth, no matter whom you teach, for you aren’t partial to anyone.

block.text: "Tisa, mipela i save, yu man bilong tok tru. Na long tok tru tasol yu save skulim ol manmeri long pasin bilong God. Yu no save pret long wanpela man. Nogat. Yu save mekim wankain tok long olgeta man, maski ol i gat nem o ol i no gat nem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Tell us therefore, what do you think? Is it lawful to pay taxes to Caesar, or not?”

block.text: Olsem na yu mas tokim mipela. Yu ting wanem? I orait long yumi ken givim takis long Sisar, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness, and said,

block.text: Tasol Jisas i save pinis long tingting nogut bilong ol, na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you test me, you hypocrites?
Show me the tax money.”

block.text: "Yupela man bilong giaman, watpo yupela i traim mi?
Yupela soim mi wanpela mani yupela i save takis long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They brought to him a denarius.
He asked them,

block.text: Na ol i kisim wanpela mani i kam long em.
Na Jisas i askim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Whose is this image and inscription?”

block.text: "Dispela piksa na dispela nem em i bilong husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him,

block.text: Na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Caesar’s.”

block.text: "Bilong Sisar."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Give therefore to Caesar the things that are Caesar’s, and to God the things that are God’s.”

block.text: "Orait, samting bilong Sisar, em yupela i mas givim long Sisar. Na samting bilong God, em yupela i mas givim long God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they heard it, they marveled, and left him, and went away.

block.text: Ol i harim dispela tok, na ol i kirap nogut. Na ol i lusim em na i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: On that day Sadducees (those who say that there is no resurrection) came to him. They asked him,
saying,

block.text: Long dispela de tasol ol Sadyusi i kam long Jisas. Ol dispela lain i save tok, ol man i dai pinis, bai ol i no inap kirap bek. Orait ol i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Teacher, Moses said, ‘If a man dies, having no children, his brother shall marry his wife, and raise up seed for his brother.’

block.text: "Tisa, Moses i bin tok olsem, 'Sapos wanpela man i no gat pikinini na em i dai, orait brata bilong en i mas maritim meri bilong en na kamapim ol pikinini, bai lain bilong brata bilong en i no ken pinis.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now there were with us seven brothers. The first married and died, and since he had no children, he left his wife to his brother.

block.text: Orait bipo i gat 7 -pela brata i stap namel long mipela. Na namba wan em i marit i stap na i dai pinis, tasol em i no gat pikinini. Olsem na brata bilong en i maritimdispela meri bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the same way, the second also, and the third, to the seventh.

block.text: Na namba 2 brata, em tu i no gat pikinini na i dai, na namba 3 brata tu i wankain, na i go i go inap long las brata, em brata namba 7.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After them all, the woman died.

block.text: Olgeta i dai pinis, na bihain tru meri tu em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the resurrection therefore, whose wife will she be of the seven? For they all had her.”

block.text: Orait yu tok. Long taim ol man i dai pinis ol i kirap bek, dispela meri bai i stap meri bilong husat bilong dispela 7 -pela brata? Yu save, olgeta ol i bin maritim em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus answered them,

block.text: Orait Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are mistaken, not knowing the Scriptures, nor the power of God.

block.text: "Yupela i no save long ol tok i stap long buk bilong God. Na yupela i no save long strong bilong God tu. Olsem na yupela i mekim tok kranki.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in the resurrection they neither marry, nor are given in marriage, but are like God’s angels in heaven.

block.text: Long taim ol man i dai pinis ol i kirap bek, ol dispela lain manmeri bai i no inap marit. Nogat. Bai ol i stap olsem ol ensel bilong heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But concerning the resurrection of the dead, haven’t you read that which was spoken to you by God when He said:

block.text: "Tasol long dispela tok bilong ol man i dai na i kirap bek, mi laik askim yupela. Ating yupela i no bin ritim dispela tok God i bin mekim long yupela? Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: ‘I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob?’ God is not the God of the dead, but of the living.”

block.text: 'Mi God bilong Abraham na bilong Aisak na bilong Jekop.' God em i no God bilong ol man i dai pinis. Em i God bilong ol man i stap laip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the multitudes heard it, they were astonished at his teaching.

block.text: Ol manmeri i harim dispela tok, na ol i kirap nogut long tok bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Pharisees, when they heard that he had silenced the Sadducees, gathered themselves together.

block.text: Taim ol Farisi i harim tok olsem Jisas i bin pasim maus bilong ol Sadyusi, orait ol i kam long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of them, a lawyer, asked him a question, testing him.

block.text: Namel long ol i gat wanpela saveman bilong lo. Em i laik traim Jisas na i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Teacher, which is the greatest commandment in the law?”

block.text: "Tisa, wanem lo i namba wan na i winim olgeta arapela lo?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “‘You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your mind.’

block.text: " 'Yupela i mas laikim God, Bikpela bilong yumi. Yupela i mas laikim em tru long bel bilong yupela na long spirit bilong yupela na long tingting bilong yupela.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is the first and great commandment.

block.text: Dispela lo em i bikpela, na em i namba wan tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A second likewise is this, ‘You shall love your neighbor as yourself.’

block.text: Na namba 2 lo em i wankain olsem dispela. Em i olsem, 'Yu mas laikim ol wantok olsem yu laikim yu yet.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: The whole law and the prophets depend on these two commandments.”

block.text: Dispela tupela lo i as bilong olgeta tok bilong lo na bilong ol profet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now while the Pharisees were gathered together, Jesus asked them a question,
saying,

block.text: Ol Farisi i bung i stap yet, na Jisas i askim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What do you think of the Christ? Whose son is he?”

block.text: "Yupela i ting wanem long dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en? Em i pikinini bilong husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him,

block.text: Na ol i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Of David.”

block.text: "Pikinini bilong Devit."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i askim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How then does David in the Spirit call him Lord, saying,

block.text: "Orait olsem wanem na Holi Spirit i givim tingting long Devit na Devit i kolim dispela man 'Bikpela'? Devit i bin tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: ‘The Lord said to my Lord, sit on my right hand, until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet?’”

block.text: 'Bikpela i tokim Bikpela bilong mi olsem, "Yu sindaun long han sut bilong mi inap mi putim ol birua bilong yu i stap aninit long yu.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If then David calls him Lord, how is he his son?”

block.text: Yupela lukim. Devit yet i kolim dispela man Bikpela bilong en. Orait olsem wanem na dispela man em i pikinini bilong Devit?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: No one was able to answer him a word, neither did any man dare ask him any more questions from that day forth.

block.text: I no gat wanpela bilong ol inap long bekim dispela tok bilong Jisas. Na stat long dispela de, ol i pret long askim Jisas long wanpela samting moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 23
Then Jesus spoke to the multitudes and to his disciples,
saying,

block.text: Bihain Jisas i autim tok long ol manmeri wantaim ol disaipel bilong en.
Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The scribes and the Pharisees sat on Moses’ seat.

block.text: "Ol saveman bilong lo wantaim ol Farisi ol i save skulim yupela long lo, olsem Moses i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All things therefore whatever they tell you to observe, observe and do, but don’t do their works; for they say, and don’t do.

block.text: Olsem na olgeta tok ol i givim long yupela, em yupela i mas harim na bihainim. Tasol pasin ol i save mekim, em yupela i no ken bihainim. Nogat. Ol i save mekim planti tok, tasol ol yet ol i no save bihainim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For they bind heavy burdens that are grievous to be borne, and lay them on men’s shoulders; but they themselves will not lift a finger to help them.

block.text: I olsem ol i save pasim karamap i hevi tumas na putim antap long sol bilong ol man, na ol man i hatwok tru long karim. Tasol ol yet i no laik putim pinga tasol bilong helpim ol man long karim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But all their works they do to be seen by men. They make their phylacteries broad, enlarge the fringes of their garments.

block.text: Olgeta samting ol i save mekim, em ol i mekim bai ol man i ken lukim. Ol i save pasim ol bikpela paspas bilong prea, na ol i save pasim ol longpela hap string long arere bilong longpela klos bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They love the place of honor at feasts, and the best seats in the synagogues.

block.text: Ol i save laik long kisim ol namba wan sia long ol bikpela kaikai, na ol namba wan ples bilong sindaun long ol haus lotu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They love to be greeted in the marketplaces, and to be called ‘Rabbi, Rabbi’ by men.

block.text: Ol i laikim tumas long ol manmeri i mas givim gude long ol long ol ples bung, na ol i laik bai ol man i mas kolim ol 'Tisa.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: But don’t you be called ‘Rabbi,’ for one is your teacher, the Christ, and all of you are brothers.

block.text: "Tasol ol man i no ken kolim yupela 'Tisa.' Nogat. Wanpela tasol em i tisa bilong yupela, na yupela olgeta i stap brata brata.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Call no man on the earth your father, for one is your Father, he who is in heaven.

block.text: Na long graun hia yupela i no ken kolim wanpela man em i papa bilong yupela. Wanpela tasol em i Papa bilong yupela, na em i stap long heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Neither be called masters, for one is your master, the Christ.

block.text: Na ol i no ken kolim yupela 'Hetman.' Yupela i gat wanpela hetman tasol, em man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he who is greatest among you will be your servant.

block.text: Bikman bilong yupela em i mas i stap wokman bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whoever exalts himself will be humbled, and whoever humbles himself will be exalted.”

block.text: Man i litimapim nem bilong em yet, nem bilong en bai i go daun. Na man i daunim em yet, em bai i kisim biknem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you devour widows’ houses, and as a pretense you make long prayers. Therefore you will receive greater damnation.”

block.text: “Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you devour widows' houses, and as a pretense you make long prayers. Therefore you will receive greater damnation.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! Because you shut up the Kingdom of Heaven against men; for you don’t enter in yourselves, neither do you allow those who are entering in to enter.

block.text: “But woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! Because you shut up the Kingdom of Heaven against men; for you don't enter in yourselves, neither do you allow those who are entering in to enter.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you travel around by sea and land to make one proselyte; and when he becomes one, you make him twice as much of a son of Gehenna as yourselves.”

block.text: "Yupela saveman bilong lo na yupela Farisi, yupela lukaut. Yupela i man bilong tupela maus. Yupela i save raun long olgeta hap bilong solwara na bilong graun, bilong mekim wanpela man tasol i kamap disaipel bilong yupela. Na taim em i kamap disaipel pinis, yupela i save mekim em i kamap man bilong i go long hel, olsem yupela yet. Yupela i mekim na em i winim yupela moa yet long ol pasin nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe to you, you blind guides, who say, ‘Whoever swears by the temple, it is nothing; but whoever swears by the gold of the temple, he is obligated.’

block.text: "Yupela aipas i laik soim rot long ol man, yupela lukaut. Yupela i save tok olsem, 'Sapos man i tok long haus bilong God na i tok tru antap, em i samting nating. Tasol sapos man i tok long gol i stap long haus bilong God na i tok tru antap, orait em i mas mekim olsem em i tok.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: You blind fools! For which is greater, the gold, or the temple that sanctifies the gold?

block.text: Yupela longlong na aipas, wanem samting i nambawan long ai bilong God? Ating gol em i nambawan? O haus bilong God em i nambawan? Yupela i save, gol i stap long haus bilong God, na dispela tasol i mekim gol i kamap samting bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ‘Whoever swears by the altar, it is nothing; but whoever swears by the gift that is on it, he is obligated?’

block.text: Na tu yupela i save tok, 'Sapos man i tok long alta na i tok tru antap, em i samting nating. Tasol sapos em i tok long ofa i stap antap long alta na i tok tru antap, orait em i mas mekim olsem em i tok.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: You blind fools! For which is greater, the gift, or the altar that sanctifies the gift?

block.text: Yupela aipas, wanem samting i nambawan long ai bilong God? Ating ofa em i nambawan? O alta em i nambawan? Yupela i save, kaikai samting bilong ofa em i stap long alta, na dispela tasol i mekim ofa i kamap samting bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He therefore who swears by the altar, swears by it, and by everything on it.

block.text: Olsem na man i tok long alta na i tok tru antap, em i strongim tok bilong en long alta wantaim olgeta samting i stap antap long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who swears by the temple, swears by it, and by him who was living in it.

block.text: Na man i tok long haus bilong God na i tok tru antap, em i strongim tok bilong en long haus bilong God wantaim God yet, em i stap long haus bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who swears by heaven, swears by the throne of God, and by the one who sits on it.”

block.text: Na man i tok long heven na i tok tru antap, em i strongim tok bilong en long sia bilong God na long God yet i sindaun long dispela sia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you tithe mint, dill, and cumin, and have left undone the weightier matters of the law: justice, mercy, and faith. But you ought to have done these, and not to have left the other undone.

block.text: "Yupela saveman bilong lo na yupela Farisi, yupela lukaut. Yupela i man bilong tupela maus. Olgeta liklik sayor samting bilong gaden em yupela i save tilim long 10 -pela hap na givim wanpela hap long God. Tasol yupela i lusim pinis olgeta bikpela hap tok bilong lo, olsem tok bilong stretpela pasin bilong skelim man na pasin bilong marimari na pasin bilong bilip. Mobeta yupela i strong long bihainim ol tok bilong ol dispela bikpela lo, na yupela i no lusim ol arapela lo tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You blind guides, who strain out a gnat, and swallow a camel!”

block.text: Yupela aipas i laik soim rot long ol man, yupela i olsem man i lukim liklik binatang tru i stap long sup bilong en, na em i wok long rausim. Tasol em i no lukim kamel i stap long sup, na em i dring na daunim olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you clean the outside of the cup and of the platter, but within they are full of extortion and unrighteousness.”

block.text: "Yupela saveman bilong lo na yupela Farisi, yupela lukaut. Yupela i man bilong tupela maus. Yupela i save klinim gut ausait bilong ol kap na plet, tasol ol kaikai samting yupela i save pulapim insait bilong ol, em yupela i save kisim long pasin bilong stil na pasin bilong tingting tasol long yupela yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You blind Pharisee, first clean the inside of the cup and of the platter, that its outside may become clean also.”

block.text: Yu Farisi, yu aipas. Pastaim yu mas klinim insait bilong kap, na bai ausait bilong en tu inap kamap klin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you are like whitened tombs, which outwardly appear beautiful, but inwardly are full of dead men’s bones, and of all uncleanness.

block.text: "Yupela saveman bilong lo na yupela Farisi, yupela lukaut. Yupela i man bilong tupela maus. Yupela i olsem matmat ol i bin penim long waitpela pen. Ausait bilong matmat em i naispela bilong lukim, tasol long insait ol bun bilong man i dai pinis na olgeta samting i doti i pulap i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so you also outwardly appear righteous to men, but inwardly you are full of hypocrisy and iniquity.”

block.text: Yupela tu i stap olsem tasol. Ol man i lukim bodi bilong yupela, ol i ting yupela i stretpela man. Tasol long insait yupela i pulap long ol pasin bilong giaman na pasin bilong sakim lo."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you build the tombs of the prophets, and decorate the tombs of the righteous.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Yupela saveman bilong lo na yupela Farisi, yupela lukaut. Yupela i man bilong tupela maus. Yupela i save wokim ol gutpela matmat bilong ol profet, na yupela i save bilasim ol matmat bilong ol stretpela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You say, ‘If we had lived in the days of our fathers, we wouldn’t have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets.’

block.text: Na yupela i save tok, 'Sapos mipela i bin i stap long taim bilong ol tumbuna, orait mipela i no helpim ol long kilim i dai ol profet.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore you testify to yourselves that you are children of those who killed the prophets.

block.text: Long dispela tok yupela yet i soim olsem, yupela i lain pikinini bilong ol man i bin kilim i dai ol profet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Fill up, then, the measure of your fathers.

block.text: Orait goan, yupela go inapim pasin nogut bilong ol tumbuna bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You serpents, you offspring of vipers, how will you escape the judgment of Gehenna?

block.text: Yupela snek nogut. God bai i kotim yupela na bai yupela i go long hel. Na bai yupela i stap gut olsem wanem?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore behold, I send to you prophets, wise men, and scribes. Some of them you will kill and crucify; and some of them you will scourge in your synagogues, and persecute from city to city.

block.text: "Olsem na yupela harim. Mi bai salim ol profet na ol man i gat gutpela tingting na ol saveman bilong lo i kam long yupela. Tasol yupela bai i kilim sampela i dai na nilim sampela long diwai kros na wipim sampela insait long ol haus lotu bilong yupela. Na bai yupela i wok long rausim ol long ol taun bilong yupela na mekim ol i ranawe i go long ol arapela taun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And so on you may come all the righteous blood shed on the earth, from the blood of righteous Abel to the blood of Zachariah son of Barachiah, whom you killed between the sanctuary and the altar.

block.text: Olsem na asua bilong olgeta man i bin kilim i dai ol stretpela man i bin i stap long dispela graun, dispela asua em bai i stap long yupela tasol. Ol i bin kilim i dai ol stretpela man, stat long Abel na i kam inap long Sekaraia, pikinini bilong Berekia, em dispela man yupela i bin kilim i dai namel long haus bilong God na long alta, na yupela yet bai i karim hevi long dispela pasin nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, all these things will come upon this generation.”

block.text: Mi tok tru long yupela, pe nogut bilong dispela olgeta pasin nogut, em bai i kamap long dispela lain manmeri nau i stap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Jerusalem, Jerusalem, who kills the prophets, and stones those who are sent to her! How often I would have gathered your children together, even as a hen gathers her chicks under her wings, and you would not!

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Jerusalem, Jerusalem, yu save kilim ol profet i dai, na yu save kisim ol man God i salim i kam long yu na tromoi ston long ol bilong kilim ol i dai. Planti taim moa mi laik bungim ol pikinini bilong yu, olsem kakaruk meri i save bungim ol pikinini bilong en aninit long wing bilong en. Tasol yupela i no laik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, your house is left to you desolate.

block.text: Harim. Nau ples bilong yupela bai i bagarap na i stap nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I tell you, you will not see me from now on, until you say, ‘Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord!’”

block.text: Mi tokim yupela olsem, yupela bai i no lukim mi moa, inap long taim yupela bai i tok, 'God i ken mekim gut long dispela man i kam long nem bilong Bikpela.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 24
Jesus went out from the temple, and was going on his way. His disciples came to him and said:

block.text: Jisas i lusim banis bilong tempel na i go, na ol disaipel bilong en i kam long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Master, look at all these magnificent buildings.”

block.text: Ol i laik soim em ol haus bilong tempel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he answered them,

block.text: Tasol em i mekim dispela tok long ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You see all of these things, don’t you? Most certainly I tell you, there will not be left here one stone on another, that will not be thrown down.”

block.text: "Yupela i lukim dispela olgeta gutpela haus, a? Mi tok tru long yupela, ol bai i no larim wanpela ston i stap antap long narapela ston. Ol bai i brukim olgeta na tromoi i go daun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As he sat on the Mount of Olives, the disciples came to him privately, saying,

block.text: Jisas i sindaun long maunten Oliv, na ol disaipel tasol i kam long em na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Tell us, when will these things be? What is the sign of your coming, and of the end of the age?”

block.text: "Yu tokim mipela, wanem taim ol dispela samting bai i kamap? Wanem mak bai i kamap pastaim, na mipela i ken save, yu laik i kam bek na dispela graun i laik pinis?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Orait Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Be careful that no one leads you astray.

block.text: "Yupela lukaut. Nogut wanpela man i giamanim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For many will come in my name, saying, ‘I am the Christ,’ and will lead many astray.

block.text: Long wanem, planti man bai i kam na kolim nem bilong mi na tok, 'Mi yet mi dispela man God i bin promis long salim i kam bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en.' Na bai ol i giamanim planti manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will hear of wars and rumors of wars. See that you aren’t troubled, for all this must happen, but the end is not yet.

block.text: Yupela bai i harim nois bilong ol bikpela pait, na yupela bai i harim tok win long ol bikpela pait i kamap. Orait yupela lukaut. Yupela i no ken kirap nogut. Ol dispela samting i mas kamap, tasol las de i no yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For nation will rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom; and there will be famines, plagues, and earthquakes in various places.

block.text: Ol man bilong sampela lain bai i kirapim pait long ol narapela narapela lain. Na ol lain bilong sampela king bai i kirapim pait long ol lain bilong ol narapela narapela king. Long sampela hap ol bai i gat taim bilong bikpela hangre, na graun bai i guria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But all these things are the beginning of birth pains.

block.text: Dispela ol samting em i olsem pen i save kamap pastaim long meri i laik karim pikinini.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they will deliver you up to oppression, and will kill you. You will be hated by all of the nations for my name’s sake.

block.text: "Long dispela taim bai ol i kisim yupela bilong givim pen na hevi long yupela, na bai ol i kilim yupela i dai. Na olgeta lain manmeri bai ol i bel nogut tru long yupela, long wanem, nem bilong mi em i stap long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then many will stumble, and will deliver up one another, and will hate one another.

block.text: Na long dispela taim planti manmeri i bin bilip long mi bai ol i lusim bilip, na bai ol i birua long ol yet na putim ol yet long han bilong ol birua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Many false prophets will arise, and will lead many astray.

block.text: Na planti giaman profet bai i kirap na giamanim planti manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Because iniquity will be multiplied, the love of many will grow cold.

block.text: Pasin nogut bai i kamap bikpela, olsem na planti man bai i lusim pasin bilong laikim ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he who endures to the end will be saved.

block.text: Tasol ol manmeri i stap strong inap long las de, God bai i kisim bek ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This Good News of the Kingdom will be preached in the whole world for a testimony to all the nations, and then the end will come.”

block.text: Na bai ol i autim dispela gutnius bilong kingdom bilong God long olgeta hap bilong graun, bai olgeta lain manmeri i ken harim, na bihain tasol bai las de i kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “When, therefore, you see the abomination of desolation, which was spoken of through Daniel the prophet, standing in the holy place (let the reader understand),

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Yupela bai i lukim dispela samting nogut tru bipo profet Daniel i bin tok long en, na dispela samting bai i sanap i stap long haus bilong God yet." Man i ritim dispela tok, em i mas tingim gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: then let those who are in Judea flee to the mountains.

block.text: "Na long dispela taim ol manmeri i stap long distrik Judia ol i mas ranawe i go long ples maunten.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let him who is on the housetop not go down to take out things that are in his house.

block.text: Na sapos man i stap antap long haus, orait taim em i go daun em i no ken ting long kisim ol samting i stap insait long haus bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let him who is in the field not return back to get his clothes.

block.text: Na man i stap long gaden, em i no ken i go bek long haus bilong kisim longpela klos bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But woe to those who are with child and to nursing mothers in those days!

block.text: Sori tumas long ol meri i gat bel na ol meri i givim susu long ol pikinini long dispela taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pray that your flight will not be in the winter, nor on a Sabbath.

block.text: Yupela i mas beten, bai yupela i no mas ranawe long taim bilong kol o long de Sabat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For then there will be great oppression, such as has not been from the beginning of the world until now, no, nor ever will be.

block.text: Long dispela taim bai i gat bikpela hevi tru. Stat long taim graun i nupela yet na i kam inap long nau, kain hevi olsem i no bin kamap bipo. Na bihain tu bai i no gat kain hevi olsem i kamap gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Unless those days had been shortened, no flesh would have been saved. But for the sake of the chosen ones, those days will be shortened.”

block.text: Na sapos God i no bin sotim taim bilong ol dispela hevi, orait olgeta manmeri bai i lus. Tasol em i tingting long ol manmeri em i makim pinis. Olsem na bai em i sotim dispela taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Then if anyone tells you, ‘Behold, here is the Christ,’ or, ‘There,’ don’t believe it.

block.text: "Long dispela taim, sapos wanpela man i tokim yupela, 'Lukim, man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, em i stap hia,' o 'Em i stap long hap,' yupela i no ken bilip long tok bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For there will arise false christs, and false prophets, and they will show great signs and wonders, so as to lead astray, if possible, even the chosen ones.”

block.text: Long wanem, sampela man bai i kam na tok giaman olsem, 'Mi dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en,' o 'Mi wanpela profet.' Na bai ol i wokim ol bikpela mirakel na mekim ol narakain narakain samting i kamap. Ol i laik paulim olgeta manmeri, na sapos ol inap ol i laik paulim tu ol manmeri God i makim bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I have told you beforehand.

block.text: "Harim. Mi tokim yupela pinis long dispela ol samting bai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If therefore they tell you, ‘Behold, he is in the wilderness,’ don’t go out; ‘Behold, he is in the inner rooms,’ don’t believe it.

block.text: Olsem na sapos ol i tokim yupela, 'Lukim, em i stap long hap i no gat man,' orait yupela i no ken i go long dispela hap. Na sapos ol i tok, 'Lukim, em i stap insait long dispela haus,' orait yupela i no ken bilip long tok bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as the lightning flashes from the east, and is seen even to the west, so will be the coming of the Son of Man.

block.text: Yupela i save, taim klaut i lait, dispela lait i save kamap long hap bilong sankamap na i lait i go olgeta long hap bilong san i go daun. Orait Pikinini Bilong Man bai i mekim olsem tasol long taim em i kamap, na olgeta manmeri bai i lukim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For wherever the carcass is, there is where the vultures gather together.

block.text: "Long ples bodi bilong ol man i dai pinis i slip i stap long en, long dispela ples tasol ol tarangau i save kam bung."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But immediately after the oppression of those days, the sun will be darkened, the moon will not give its light, the stars will fall from the sky, and the powers of the heavens will be shaken.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Taim bilong ol dispela bikpela hevi i pinis, orait kwiktaim san bai i kamap tudak, na mun bai i no moa lait, na ol sta bai i lusim skai na pundaun, na ol strongpela samting i stap long skai bai i guria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the sign of the Son of Man will appear in the sky. Then all the tribes of the earth will mourn, and they will see the Son of Man coming on the clouds of the sky with power and great glory.

block.text: Long dispela taim mak bilong Pikinini Bilong Man bai i kamap long skai na olgeta lain manmeri bilong graun bai i krai. Na ol bai i lukim Pikinini Bilong Man i stap antap long ol klaut bilong heven na i kam wantaim bikpela strong na bikpela lait bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will send out his angels with a great sound of a trumpet, and they will gather together his chosen ones from the four winds, from one end of the sky to the other.”

block.text: Na biugel bai i krai strong moa, na em bai i salim ol ensel bilong en i go bilong bungim ol manmeri em i bin makim bilong em yet. Ol ensel bai i kisim ol long olgeta hap, i go inap long arere tru bilong graun, na bringim ol i kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now from the fig tree learn this parable. When its branch has now become tender, and puts forth its leaves, you know that the summer is near.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Yupela i ken kisim save long diwai fik. Taim han bilong en i gat wara na ol nupela lip i kamap, yupela i save, taim bilong gutpela san i laik kamap nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so you also, when you see all these things, know that it is near, even at the doors.

block.text: Olsem tasol, taim yupela i lukim dispela olgeta samting i kamap pinis, orait yupela i ken save, Pikinini Bilong Man i kam klostu pinis, na i stap long dua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, this generation will not pass away, until all these things are accomplished.

block.text: Mi tok tru long yupela, taim ol manmeri bilong dispela taim i no i dai yet, dispela olgeta samting bai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will not pass away.

block.text: Skai wantaim graun bai i lus, tasol tok bilong mi bai i no inap lus."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But no one knows of that day and hour, not even the angels of heaven, but my Father only.”

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Tasol i no gat wanpela man i save wanem de na wanem aua dispela ol samting bai i kamap. Ol ensel long heven i no save, na Pikinini tu em i no save. Papa wanpela tasol em i save.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “As the days of Noah were, so will be the coming of the Son of Man.

block.text: Kain pasin ol i bin mekim long taim bilong Noa, ol bai i mekim wankain pasin tasol long taim Pikinini Bilong Man i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as in those days which were before the flood they were eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, until the day that Noah entered into the ship,

block.text: Taim bikpela tait i no kamap yet, ol i wok long kaikai na dring, na ol man i maritim ol meri, i go inap long taim Noa i go insait long sip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and they didn’t know until the flood came, and took them all away, so will be the coming of the Son of Man.

block.text: Ol i no save long dispela samting bai i kamap long ol, na ol i stap olsem tasol i go inap long taim bikpela tait i kamap na i pinisim olgeta dispela manmeri. Orait wankain pasin tasol bai i kamap long taim Pikinini Bilong Man i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then two men will be in the field: one will be taken and one will be left.

block.text: Tupela man bai i stap long gaden, na God bai i kisim wanpela, na em i bai lusim narapela i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Two women grinding at the mill, one will be taken and one will be left.

block.text: Tupela meri bai i wokim plaua bilong bret i stap, na God bai i kisim wanpela na lusim narapela i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Watch therefore, for you don’t know in what hour your Lord comes.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas was gut. Yupela i no save wanem de Bikpela bilong yupela bai i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But know this, that if the master of the house had known in what watch of the night the thief was coming, he would have watched, and would not have allowed his house to be broken into.

block.text: Yupela tingim dispela samting. Sapos papa bilong haus i save pastaim long wanem taim long nait stilman bai i kam, orait em bai i was i stap na em bai i no inap larim stilman i brukim haus na i kam insait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore also be ready, for in an hour that you don’t expect, the Son of Man will come.”

block.text: Olsem na yupela tu i mas redi. Pikinini Bilong Man bai i kam long wanpela taim yupela i no ting em bai i kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who then is the faithful and wise servant, whom his lord has set over his household, to give them their food in due season?

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Wanem wokboi i gat gutpela tingting, na i save mekim gutpela wok oltaim? Bikman i save makim dispela kain wokboi bilong bosim ol arapela wokboi bilong en, na bilong skelim kaikai long ol long taim bikman i makim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed is that servant whom his lord finds doing so when he comes.

block.text: Dispela kain wokboi i ken amamas tru taim bikman bilong en i kam bek na i lukim em i stap mekim wok bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you that he will set him over all that he has.

block.text: Mi tok tru long yupela, bikman bai i makim dispela wokboi bilong bosim olgeta samting bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if that servant is evil, he will say in his heart, ‘My lord is delaying his coming.’

block.text: Tasol sapos dispela wokboi em i man nogut na em i ting long bel bilong en, 'Bikman bilong mi bai i no inap i kam kwik,'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he will begin to beat his fellow servants, and eat and drink with the drunkards.

block.text: na em i stat long paitim ol wanwok bilong en, na em i wok long kaikai na dring wantaim ol man i save spak,

ReferenceBlocks.text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he doesn’t expect it, and in an hour when he doesn’t know it.

block.text: orait bikman bai i kam bek long wanpela de dispela wokboi i no redi, na long wanpela taim em i no save long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will cut him in pieces and assign him a place with the hypocrites, where there will be weeping and grinding of teeth.”

block.text: Na bikman bai i bagarapim tru dispela wokboi, na bai em i putim em i stap wantaim ol man bilong giaman, em ol man bilong tupela maus. Long dispela hap bai ol i krai nogut na skrapim tit bilong ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 25
“Then the Kingdom of Heaven will be like ten virgins, who took their lamps, and went out to meet the bridegroom.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Long dispela taim kingdom bilong heven bai i olsem stori bilong 10 -pela yangpela meri. Wanpela man i marit nupela, em i laik i kam. Na dispela ol yangpela meri ol i kisim ol lam bilong ol, na ol i go bilong bungim em long rot na bringim em i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Five of them were foolish, and five were wise.

block.text: 5 -pela bilong ol dispela meri ol i kranki meri, na 5 -pela i gat save.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who were foolish took their lamps with them but took no oil.

block.text: Ol kranki meri i bringim ol lam bilong ol i kam, tasol ol i no kisim arapela wel i kam wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The wise took oil in their vessels along with their lamps.

block.text: Tasol ol meri i gat save, ol i pulimapim arapela wel long ol botol bilong ol na ol i bringim i kam wantaim ol lam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now while the bridegroom delayed, they all slumbered and slept.

block.text: Dispela man i marit nupela em i no kam kwik, olsem na ai bilong olgeta meri i hevi na ol i slip i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But at midnight there was a cry, ‘Behold! The bridegroom is coming! Come out to meet him!’

block.text: "Na long biknait tru ol i harim wanpela man i singaut olsem, 'Man i marit nupela em i kam nau. Yupela kam, yumi go bungim em long rot na bringim em i kam.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then all those virgins arose, and trimmed their lamps.

block.text: Orait dispela olgeta yangpela meri ol i kirap, na ol i redim lam bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The foolish said to the wise, ‘Give us some of your oil, for our lamps are going out.’

block.text: Na ol kranki meri i tokim ol meri i gat save olsem, 'Yupela givim mipela hap wel bilong yupela. Ol lam bilong mipela i laik i dai.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the wise answered, saying, ‘What if there isn’t enough oil for us and you? You go rather to those who sell oil, and buy some for yourselves.’

block.text: Tasol ol savemeri i bekim tok olsem long ol, 'Nogat. Dispela wel bai i no inap long mipela na long yupela tu. Mobeta yupela i go long stua na baim bilong yupela yet.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: While they went away to buy more oil, the bridegroom came, and those who were ready went in with him to the marriage feast, and the door was shut.

block.text: Orait ol 5 -pela kranki meri i go pinis bilong baim wel, na dispela man i marit nupela em i kam. Na ol meri i redi ol i go insait long haus wantaim em long bikpela kaikai bilong marit. Na ol man i pasim dua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Afterward the other virgins also came, saying, ‘Lord, Lord, open to us.’

block.text: "Bihain ol arapela yangpela meri i kam, na ol i tok, 'Bikman, bikman, kam opim dua long mipela.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he answered, ‘Most certainly I tell you, I don’t know you.’

block.text: Tasol em i bekim tok olsem, 'Mi tok tru long yupela, mi no save long yupela.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Watch therefore, for you don’t know the day nor the hour in which the Son of Man is coming.”

block.text: Na Jisas i tok, "Olsem na yupela i mas was gut. Yupela i no save long wanem de na wanem aua Bikpela bilong yupela bai i kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “For it is like a man, going into another country, who called his own servants, and entrusted his goods to them.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Kingdom bilong heven bai i olsem wanpela man i laik wokabaut i go long longwe ples. Em i singautim ol wokboi bilong en i kam, na i putim ol samting bilong en long han bilong ol, bai ol i ken lukautim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: To one he gave five talents, to another two, to another one; to each according to his own ability. Then he went on his journey.

block.text: Em i tingim pasin na strong bilong ol wokboi wan wan, na em i tilim mani long ol. Long narapela em i givim 5,000 kina na long narapela em i givim 2,000 kina na long narapela em i givim 1,000 kina. Em i mekim olsem na em i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately he who received the five talents went and traded with them, and made another five talents.

block.text: Em i go pinis, orait kwiktaim dispela man i bin kisim 5,000 kina em i wok bisnis long dispela mani na i kisim winmani inap long 5,000 kina moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the same way, he who got the two talents gained another two.

block.text: Na dispela man i bin kisim 2,000 kina, em tu i wok bisnis na i kisim 2,000 kina moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he who received the one went away and dug a hole in the ground and hid his lord’s money.”

block.text: Tasol man i bin kisim 1,000 kina, em i go wokim hul long graun na i haitim mani bilong bikman bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now after a long time the lord of those servants came, and reconciled accounts with them.

block.text: "Longpela taim i go pinis, na bihain bikman bilong ol dispela wokboi i kam bek. Na em i laik stretim tok wantaim ol long dispela mani em i bin givim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who received the five talents came and brought another five talents, saying, ‘Lord, you delivered to me five talents. Behold, I have gained another five talents besides them.’”

block.text: Na man i bin kisim 5,000 kina em i kam, na em i bringim 5,000 kina moa, na i tok olsem, 'Bikman, yu bin givim mi 5,000 kina. Lukim, mi wok bisnis na mi kisim 5,000 kina moa.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “His lord said to him, ‘Well done, good and faithful servant. You have been faithful over a few things, I will set you over many things. Enter into the joy of your lord.’”

block.text: Na bikman bilong en i tokim em olsem, 'Yu gutpela wokboi, yu bin mekim gutpela wok tru. Yu save lukautim gut wok bilong yu. Yu bin lukautim gut ol liklik samting, olsem na mi laik bai yu bosim planti samting. Yu kam amamas wantaim mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He also who got the two talents came and said, ‘Lord, you delivered to me two talents. Behold, I have gained another two talents besides them.’”

block.text: "Man i bin kisim 2,000 kina em tu i kam, na em i tok olsem, 'Bikman, yu bin givim mi 2,000 kina. Lukim, mi wok bisnis na mi kisim 2,000 kina moa.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “His lord said to him, ‘Well done, good and faithful servant. You have been faithful over a few things, I will set you over many things. Enter into the joy of your lord.’”

block.text: Na bikman bilong en i tokim em olsem, 'Yu gutpela wokboi, yu bin mekim gutpela wok tumas. Yu save lukautim gut wok bilong yu. Yu bin lukautim gut ol liklik samting, olsem na mi laik bai yu bosim planti samting. Yu kam amamas wantaim mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He also who had received the one talent came and said, ‘Lord, I knew you that you are a hard man, reaping where you did not sow, and gathering where you did not scatter.

block.text: "Na man i bin kisim 1,000 kina em tu i kam, na em i tok olsem, 'Bikman, mi save pinis, yu hatpela man. Yu save kamautim kaikai long ol gaden ol arapela man i planim. Na long hap graun narapela man i bin tromoi pikinini kaikai long en, yu save kisim ol kaikai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was afraid, and went away and hid your talent in the ground. Behold, you have what is yours.’”

block.text: Olsem na mi pret na mi go haitim dispela 1,000 kina bilong yu long graun. Em hia mani bilong yu.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But his lord answered him, ‘You wicked and slothful servant. You knew that I reap where I didn’t sow, and gather where I didn’t scatter.

block.text: "Tasol bikman bilong en i bekim tok olsem, 'Yu wokboi nogut. Yu lesman. Yu save gut olsem mi save kamautim kaikai long ol gaden ol arapela man i bin planim, na mi save kisim kaikai long hap graun narapela man i bin tromoi pikinini kaikai long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You ought therefore to have deposited my money with the bankers, and at my coming I should have received back my own with interest.

block.text: Orait watpo yu no putim mani bilong mi long beng? Olsem na taim mi kam bek mi inap kisim ol mani bilong mi wantaim sampela winmani tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Take away therefore the talent from him, and give it to him who has the ten talents.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas kisim dispela 1,000 kina long em na givim long dispela man i gat 10,000 kina.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For to everyone who has will be given, and he will have abundance, but from him who doesn’t have, even that which he has will be taken away.

block.text: Long wanem, olgeta man i gat sampela samting pinis, bai mi givim sampela moa long ol. Tasol sapos wanpela man i no gat ol samting, orait liklik samting em i holim, em bai mi rausim long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Throw out the unprofitable servant into the outer darkness, where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth.’”

block.text: Na dispela wokboi nogut, yupela rausim em i go ausait long ples tudak. Long dispela hap bai ol i krai nogut na skrapim tit bilong ol.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But when the Son of Man comes in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then he will sit on the throne of his glory.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Taim Pikinini Bilong Man i kam bek olsem king wantaim olgeta ensel, orait em bai i sindaun long sia king bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Before him all the nations will be gathered, and he will separate them one from another, as a shepherd separates the sheep from the goats.

block.text: Na olgeta lain manmeri bai ol i kam bung long pes bilong em. Na em bai i tilim ol na putim ol long tupela lain, olsem wasman i save tilim ol sipsip i go long hap na ol meme i go long hap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will set the sheep on his right hand, but the goats on the left.

block.text: Em bai i putim ol sipsip long han sut bilong en, na ol meme long han kais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the King will tell those on his right hand, ‘Come, blessed of my Father, inherit the Kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world.

block.text: Orait na king bai i tokim ol manmeri i stap long han sut bilong en olsem, 'Yupela i gat blesing bilong Papa bilong mi. Em i laik mekim gut long yupela. Yupela kam kisim kingdom Papa i bin redim na makim bilong yupela pinis, long taim graun i kamap nupela yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I was hungry, and you gave me food to eat. I was thirsty, and you gave me drink. I was a stranger, and you took me in.

block.text: Long wanem, bipo mi stap hangre, na yupela i bin givim kaikai long mi. Mi dai long wara, na yupela i givim wara long mi. Mi man bilong narapela ples na yupela i bringim mi i go long haus bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was naked, and you clothed me. I was sick, and you visited me. I was in prison, and you came to me.’”

block.text: Mi no gat laplap, na yupela i givim laplap long mi. Mi gat sik na yupela i lukautim mi. Mi stap long kalabus, na yupela i kam lukim mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Then the righteous will answer him, saying, ‘Lord, when did we see you hungry, and feed you; or thirsty, and give you a drink?

block.text: "Na ol stretpela manmeri bai i bekim tok bilong en olsem, 'Bikpela, long wanem taim mipela i lukim yu i stap hangre, na mipela i givim kaikai long yu? Na wanem taim yu dai long wara, na mipela i givim wara long yu?

ReferenceBlocks.text: When did we see you as a stranger, and take you in; or naked, and clothe you?

block.text: Long wanem taim mipela i lukim yu i stap man bilong narapela ples, na mipela i bringim yu i go long haus bilong mipela? Na long wanem taim yu no gat laplap, na mipela i givim laplap long yu?

ReferenceBlocks.text: When did we see you sick, or in prison, and come to you?’”

block.text: Long wanem taim mipela i lukim yu gat sik, o yu stap long kalabus, na mipela i go lukim yu?'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The King will answer them, ‘Most certainly I tell you, inasmuch as you did it to one of the least of these my brothers, you did it to me.’

block.text: "Na king bai i bekim tok bilong ol olsem, 'Mi tok tru long yupela, olgeta samting yupela i bin mekim long wanpela bilong ol dispela brata bilong mi i no gat nem liklik, ol dispela samting yupela i bin mekim long mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he will say also to those on the left hand, ‘Depart from me, you cursed, into the eternal fire which is prepared for the devil and his angels.

block.text: "Orait na king bai i tokim ol lain i stap long han kais olsem, 'Yupela manmeri bilong lus, yupela klia long mi na yupela go long paia i no save dai, em dispela paia ol i redim pinis bilong Satan wantaim ol ensel bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: for I was hungry, and you didn’t give me food to eat; I was thirsty, and you gave me no drink.

block.text: Long wanem, bipo mi stap hangre, na yupela i no givim kaikai long mi. Mi dai long wara, na yupela i no givim wara long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was a stranger, and you didn’t take me in; naked, and you didn’t clothe me; sick, and in prison, and you didn’t visit me.’”

block.text: Mi man bilong narapela ples, na yupela i no bringim mi i go long haus bilong yupela. Mi no gat laplap, na yupela i no givim laplap long mi. Mi gat sik, na mi stap long kalabus, na yupela i no kam lukim mi.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Then they will also answer, saying, ‘Lord, when did we see you hungry, or thirsty, or a stranger, or naked, or sick, or in prison, and didn’t help you?’”

block.text: "Na bai ol tu i bekim tok bilong en olsem, 'Bikpela, long wanem taim mipela i lukim yu i stap hangre, o yu dai long wara, o yu man bilong narapela ples, o yu no gat laplap, o yu gat sik, o yu stap long kalabus, na mipela i no mekim gut long yu?'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Then he will answer them, saying, ‘Most certainly I tell you, inasmuch as you didn’t do it to one of the least of these, you didn’t do it to me.’

block.text: "Na em bai i bekim tok bilong ol olsem, 'Mi tok tru long yupela, samting yupela i no bin mekim long wanpela bilong ol dispela manmeri i no gat nem liklik, ol dispela samting yupela i no bin mekim long mi tu.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: These will go away into eternal punishment, but the righteous into eternal life.”

block.text: Na ol dispela lain bai i go bilong kisim pe nogut, em pen i save stap oltaim. Tasol ol stretpela manmeri bai i kisim laip i stap oltaim oltaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 26
It happened, when Jesus had finished all these words, that he said to his disciples,

block.text: Jisas i autim pinis dispela olgeta tok, orait em i tokim ol disaipel bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You know that after two days the Passover is coming, and the Son of Man will be delivered up to be crucified.”

block.text: "Yupela i save, tupela de tasol i stap, na Bikpela De Bilong Tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut, em bai i kamap. Na bai ol i putim Pikinini Bilong Man long han bilong ol birua na bai ol i hangamapim em long diwai kros."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the chief priests, the scribes, and the elders of the people were gathered together in the court of the high priest, who was called Caiaphas.

block.text: Long dispela taim ol bikpris na ol hetman bilong Israel ol i bung long haus bilong hetpris, nem bilong en Kaiafas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They took counsel together that they might take Jesus by deceit, and kill him.
But they said,

block.text: Na ol i wokim toktok bilong painim rot long giamanim Jisas na holimpas em bai ol i ken kilim em i dai.
Tasol ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Not during the feast, lest a riot occur among the people.”

block.text: "Yumi no ken mekim dispela samting long ol bikpela de bilong lotu. Nogut ol manmeri i lukim na ol i kros na kirapim pait."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Jesus was in Bethany, in the house of Simon the leper.

block.text: Jisas i stap long ples Betani long haus bilong Saimon, em wanpela man bipo i bin i gat sik lepra.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A woman came to him having an alabaster jar of very expensive ointment, and she poured it on his head as he sat at the table.

block.text: Na wanpela meri i kisim wanpela naispela botol ston i gat sanda i dia tumas na i kam long dispela haus. Jisas i sindaun i stap long tebol na meri i kapsaitim dispela sanda long het bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when his disciples saw this, they were indignant, saying,

block.text: Ol disaipel i lukim dispela, na ol i bel nogut. Ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why this waste?
For this ointment might have been sold for much, and given to the poor.”

block.text: "Bilong wanem em i pinisim nating dispela sanda?
Sapos yumi bin larim ol man i baim, bai yumi inap kisim bikpela mani long en na givim long ol rabisman."

ReferenceBlocks.text: However, knowing this, Jesus said to them,

block.text: Jisas I save long tok bilong ol, na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you trouble the woman? Because she has done a good work for me.

block.text: "Watpo yupela i givim hevi long dispela meri? Em i bin mekim gutpela pasin tru long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you always have the poor with you; but you don’t always have me.

block.text: Oltaim ol rabisman bai i stap wantaim yupela. Tasol mi, bai mi no inap i stap wantaim yupela oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in pouring this ointment on my body, she did it to prepare me for burial.

block.text: Meri i kapsaitim dispela sanda long bodi bilong mi, em i bin mekim dispela bilong redim bodi bilong mi long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, wherever this Good News is preached in the whole world, what this woman has done will also be spoken of as a memorial of her.”

block.text: Mi tok tru long yupela, long olgeta hap graun ol i go long en na autim dispela gutnius, ol bai i toktok tu long samting dispela meri i bin mekim, na bai ol i tingting long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then one of the twelve, who was called Judas Iscariot, went to the chief priests,
and said,

block.text: Long dispela taim wanpela bilong ol 12 -pela disaipel, nem bilong en Judas Iskariot, em i go long ol bikpris.
Na em i askim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What are you willing to give me, that I should deliver him to you?”

block.text: "Sapos mi givim Jisas long han bilong yupela, yupela bai i givim wanem samting long mi?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They weighed out for him thirty pieces of silver.

block.text: Orait ol i givim 30 mani silva long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: From that time he sought opportunity to betray him.

block.text: Na Judas i stat long painim rot bilong givim Jisas long han bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now on the first day of unleavened bread, the disciples came to Jesus, saying to him,

block.text: Long namba wan de bilong Ol Bikpela De Bilong Bret I No Gat Yis, ol disaipel i kam long Jisas na ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where do you want us to prepare for you to eat the Passover?”

block.text: "Yu laik bai mipela i redim ol samting long wanem hap na yu ken kaikai dispela kaikai bilong tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol long wanpela man na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Go into the city to a certain person, and tell him, ‘The Teacher says, “My time is at hand. I will keep the Passover at your house with my disciples.”’”

block.text: "Yupela go insait long taun na yupela go long dispela man na tokim em olsem, 'Tisa i tok, taim bilong mi em i kam klostu pinis. Mi wantaim ol disaipel bilong mi i laik i kam long haus bilong yu na kaikai dispela kaikai bilong tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The disciples did as Jesus commanded them, and they prepared the Passover.

block.text: Orait ol disaipel i mekim olsem Jisas i tokim ol, na ol i redim dispela kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now when evening had come, he was reclining at the table with the twelve disciples.

block.text: Na long apinun Jisas i sindaun long tebol wantaim ol 12 -pela disaipel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As they were eating, he said,

block.text: Ol i kaikai i stap, na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you that one of you will betray me.”

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, wanpela bilong yupela bai i givim mi long han bilong ol man i birua long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were exceedingly sorrowful, and each began to ask him,

block.text: Ol disaipel i harim dispela tok na ol i bel hevi tumas, na ol wan wan i stat long askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It isn’t me, is it, Lord?”

block.text: "Bikpela, ating yu tok long mi, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered,

block.text: Na em i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He who dipped his hand with me in the dish, the same will betray me.

block.text: "Dispela man i laik givim mi long han bilong ol birua, em wanpela bilong yupela ol man i bin putim han long dis wantaim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Son of Man goes, even as it is written of him, but woe to that man through whom the Son of Man is betrayed! It would be better for that man if he had not been born.”

block.text: Pikinini Bilong Man bai i dai, olsem buk bilong God i tok pinis long em i mas i dai. Tasol sori tumas long dispela man i givim Pikinini Bilong Man long han bilong ol birua. Mobeta mama i no bin karim dispela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judas, who betrayed him, answered,

block.text: Judas, em dispela man i laik putim em long han bilong ol birua, em i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It isn’t me, is it, Rabbi?”

block.text: "Tisa, ating yu tok long mi, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You said it.”

block.text: "I olsem yu tok."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As they were eating, Jesus took bread, gave thanks for it, and broke it. He gave to the disciples, and said,

block.text: Ol i kaikai i stap, na Jisas i kisim wanpela bret, na i tenkyu long God na i brukim, na i givim long ol disaipel. Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take, eat; this is my body.”

block.text: "Yupela kisim na kaikai. Dispela em i bodi bilong mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He took the cup, gave thanks, and gave to them, saying,

block.text: Na em i kisim wanpela kap wain, na i tenkyu long God, na i givim long ol, na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “All of you drink it,
for this is my blood of the new covenant, which is poured out for many for the remission of sins.

block.text: "Yupela olgeta dring long dispela.
Dispela em i blut bilong mi bilong mekim kontrak. Mi kapsaitim bilong tekewe sin bilong planti manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I tell you that I will not drink of this fruit of the vine from now on, until that day when I drink it anew with you in my Father’s Kingdom.”

block.text: Mi tokim yupela, mi no ken dring wain moa inap long taim mi dringim nupela wain wantaim yupela insait long kingdom bilong Papa bilong mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had sung a hymn, they went out to the Mount of Olives.
Then Jesus said to them,

block.text: Orait ol i singim wanpela song, na ol i lusim taun na i go long maunten Oliv.
Jisas i tokim ol disaipel bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “All of you will be made to stumble because of me tonight, for it is written, ‘I will strike the shepherd, and the sheep of the flock will be scattered.’

block.text: "Yupela bai i lukim ol samting i kamap long mi long dispela nait na bilip bilong yupela olgeta bai i pundaun, long wanem, buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, 'Mi kilim wasman, na bai ol sipsip i ranawe i go nabaut.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: But after I am raised up, I will go before you into Galilee.”

block.text: Tasol bai mi kirap bek, na bai mi go paslain long yupela long Galili."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter answered him,

block.text: Pita i bekim tok bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Even if all will be made to stumble because of you, I will never be made to stumble.”

block.text: "Maski sapos ol arapela i lukim samting i kamap long yu na bilip bilong olgeta i pundaun na ol i lusim yu, mi bai i no inap lusim yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you that tonight, before the rooster crows, you will deny me three times.”

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yu, nau long dispela nait, taim kakaruk i no krai yet, yu bai tok tripela taim olsem yu no save long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter said to him,

block.text: Na Pita i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Even if I must die with you, I will not deny you.”

block.text: "Maski sapos mi mas i dai wantaim yu, mi no inap tok olsem mi no save long yu. Nogat tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: And all of the other disciples said the same.

block.text: Na olgeta disaipel ol i mekim wankain tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Jesus came with them to a place called Gethsemane, and said to his disciples,

block.text: Jisas i go wantaim ol disaipel long wanpela hap ol i kolim Getsemani. Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Sit here, while I go there and pray.”

block.text: "Yupela sindaun i stap hia, na bai mi go long hap na mi beten."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, and began to be sorrowful and severely troubled.
Then he said to them,

block.text: Na em i kisim Pita wantaim tupela pikinini bilong Sebedi i go wantaim. Na bel bilong en i hevi, na em i pilim nogut tru.
Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My soul is exceedingly sorrowful, even to death. Stay here, and watch with me.”

block.text: "Bel bilong mi em i hevi tumas, na klostu mi laik i dai. Yupela stap hia na was wantaim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went forward a little, fell on his face, and prayed, saying,

block.text: Na em i go liklik, na em i pundaun na putim pes bilong en i go daun long graun na em i beten olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My Father, if it is possible, let this cup pass away from me; nevertheless, not what I desire, but what you desire.”

block.text: "Papa bilong mi, sapos inap, orait mi laik bai yu rausim dispela kap long mi. Tasol yu no ken bihainim laik bilong mi. Nogat. Yu mas bihainim laik bilong yu tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came to the disciples, and found them sleeping, and said to Peter,

block.text: Na Jisas i go long ol tripela disaipel, na em i lukim ol i slip i stap. Na em i askim Pita olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What, couldn’t you watch with me for one hour?

block.text: "Olsem wanem? Yupela i no inap was wantaim mi inap long wan aua, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Watch and pray, that you don’t enter into temptation. The spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.”

block.text: Yupela i mas was na prea i stap. Nogut traim i kamap long yupela na yupela i pundaun. Tru, bel em i gat laik bilong mekim samting, tasol bodi em i no gat strong."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again, a second time he went away, and prayed, saying,

block.text: Em i go gen namba 2 taim na i beten olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My Father, if this cup can’t pass away from me unless I drink it, your desire be done.”

block.text: "Papa bilong mi, sapos dispela kap i no inap abrusim mi, na mi mas dringim, orait yu ken bihainim laik bilong yu tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came again and found them sleeping, for their eyes were heavy.

block.text: Na em i kam gen long ol disaipel na i lukim ol i slip i stap, long wanem, ai bilong ol i hevi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He left them again, went away, and prayed a third time, saying the same words.

block.text: Na em i lusim ol gen na i go beten namba 3 taim, na em i mekim wankain prea olsem em i bin mekim bipo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he came to his disciples, and said to them,

block.text: Bihain em i kam long ol disaipel na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Sleep on now, and take your rest. Behold, the hour is at hand, and the Son of Man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.

block.text: "Yupela i slip yet na malolo, a? Harim. Taim i kamap pinis, na nau ol i givim Pikinini Bilong Man long han bilong ol man bilong mekim sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Arise, let’s be going. Behold, he who betrays me is at hand.”

block.text: Yupela kirap, na yumi go. Lukim, man i laik givim mi long han bilong ol, em i kamap klostu nau."

ReferenceBlocks.text: While he was still speaking, behold, Judas, one of the twelve, came, and with him a great multitude with swords and clubs, from the chief priest and elders of the people.

block.text: Jisas i toktok yet i stap, na Judas, em wanpela bilong ol 12 -pela disaipel, em i kam. Bikpela lain man tru i kam wantaim em, na ol i holim ol bainat na stik. Ol bikpris wantaim ol hetman bilong ol manmeri i salim ol i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now he who betrayed him gave them a sign, saying,

block.text: Dispela man i laik givim Jisas long han bilong ol, em i bin tokim ol long wanpela mak olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Whoever I kiss, he is the one. Seize him.”

block.text: "Bai mi givim kis long wanpela man. Dispela man em Jisas. Yupela holimpas em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately he came to Jesus, and said,

block.text: Na wantu em i kam long Jisas na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hail, Rabbi!”

block.text: "Gutnait, Tisa."

ReferenceBlocks.text: and kissed him.
Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na em i givim kis long em.
Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Friend, why are you here?”

block.text: "Pren, samting yu kam bilong mekim, em yu mas mekim hariap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they came and laid hands on Jesus, and took him.

block.text: Na ol man i kam na putim han long Jisas na holimpas em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, one of those who were with Jesus stretched out his hand, and drew his sword, and
struck the servant of the high priest, and struck off his ear.
Then Jesus said to him,

block.text: Orait wanpela man i stap wantaim Jisas, em i pulim bainat bilong en. Na em i paitim wokboi bilong hetpris na bainat
i katim yau bilong en na yau i pundaun.
Tasol Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Put your sword back into its place, for all those who take the sword will die by the sword.

block.text: "Putim bainat bilong yu i go bek long paus bilong en. Olgeta man i pait long bainat, bainat bai i bagarapim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Or do you think that I couldn’t ask my Father, and he would even now send me more than twelve legions of angels?

block.text: Ating yu no save, mi inap askim Papa bilong mi, na em bai i salim planti ensel moa, i winim 12 -pela lain ami, na ol bai i kam helpim mi?

ReferenceBlocks.text: But how then would the Scriptures be fulfilled that it must be so?”

block.text: Tasol sapos mi mekim olsem, orait tok i stap long buk bilong God em bai i no inap kamap tru. Buk bilong God i tok, ol dispela samting i mas kamap long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: In that hour Jesus said to the multitudes,

block.text: Long dispela taim tasol Jisas i tokim ol dispela lain man olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have you come out as against a robber with swords and clubs to seize me? I sat daily in the temple teaching, and you didn’t arrest me.

block.text: "Yupela i kisim ol bainat nastik na yupela i kam bilong holimpas mi, olsem yupela i laik holimpaswanpela man bilong pait na stil, a? Olgeta de mi bin sindaun insait long banis bilong tempel na mi skulim ol manmeri. Yupela i no laikholimpas mi long dispela taim?

ReferenceBlocks.text: But all this has happened, that the Scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled.”

block.text: Tasol dispela olgeta samting ikamap bilong inapim tok ol profet i bin raitim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then all the disciples left him, and fled.

block.text: Na olgeta disaipel i lusim Jisas na ol i ranawe.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who had taken Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest, where the scribes and the elders were gathered together.

block.text: Ol man i bin holimpas Jisas ol i bringim em i go long haus bilong hetpris Kaiafas. Na ol saveman bilong lo wantaim ol hetman ol i bung i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter followed him from a distance, to the court of the high priest, and entered in and sat with the officers, to see the end.

block.text: Pita i bihainim Jisas i go, tasol em i stap longwe liklik. Em i go insait long banis bilong haus bilong hetpris, na i sindaun wantaim ol plisman. Em i laik lukim wanem samting bai i kamap long Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the chief priests, the elders, and the whole council sought false testimony against Jesus, that they might put him to death.

block.text: Ol bikpris wantaim olgeta kaunsil ol i singautim sampela man i kam autim tok giaman long ol pasin Jisas i bin mekim. Ol i laik painim wanpela rong em i bin mekim inap long ol i ken kilim em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they did not find any, even though many false witnesses came forward. Finally, two false witnesses came forward,
and said,

block.text: Na planti man i kam na i sutim tok giaman long em. Tasol ol i no tokaut long wanpela rong em i bin mekim inap long ol i ken kilim em i dai. Tasol bihain tupela man i kam
na i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This man said, ‘I am able to destroy the temple of God, and to build it in three days.’”

block.text: "Dispela man i bin tok, 'Mi inap brukim tempel bilong God na sanapim bek long tripela de tasol.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The high priest stood up, and said to him,

block.text: Na hetpris i sanap na i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have you no answer? What is this that these testify against you?”

block.text: "Yu no laik bekim wanpela tok, a? Olsem wanem long dispela tok ol i sutim long yu?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus held his peace. The high priest answered him,

block.text: Tasol Jisas i no mekim wanpela tok. Na hetpris i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I adjure you by the living God, that you tell us whether you are the Christ, the Son of God.”

block.text: "Mi askim yu long nem bilong God i gat laip, na yu mas tok tru antap nau. Yu dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en? Yu Pikinini Bilong God, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You have said it. Nevertheless, I tell you, after this you will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of Power, and coming on the clouds of the sky.”

block.text: "Yu tok pinis. Tasol mi tokim yupela, bihain bai yupela i lukim Pikinini Bilong Man i sindaun long han sut bilong God i gat bikpela strong. Na em bai i stap antap long ol klaut bilong heven na I kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the high priest tore his clothing, saying,

block.text: Na hetpris i kirap nogut long dispela tok na i brukim klos bilong em yet na i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He has spoken blasphemy! Why do we need any more witnesses? Behold, now you have heard his blasphemy.
What do you think?”

block.text: "Em i tok bilas long God. Yumi no ken singautim sampela man moa bilong tokaut long pasin bilong dispela man. Nogat. Nau tasol yupela i harim em i tok bilas long God.
Yupela i ting bai yumi mas mekim wanem long em?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They answered,

block.text: Na ol i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He is worthy of death!”

block.text: "Em i gat rong, na em i mas i dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they spit in his face and beat him with their fists, and some slapped him,
saying,

block.text: Orait ol i spetim pes bilong Jisas, na ol i paitim em. Na sampela i solapim em
na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Prophesy to us, you Christ! Who hit you?”

block.text: "Yu man God i makim, yu mekim tok profet nau. Dispela man i paitim yu, em husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Peter was sitting outside in the court, and a servant girl came to him, saying,

block.text: Pita i sindaun i stap ausait, insait long banis bilong haus. Na wanpela wokmeri i kam klostu long em na i tok,

block.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard
ReferenceBlocks.text: “You were also with Jesus, the Galilean!”

block.text: "Yu tu yu bin i stap wantaim Jisas bilong Galili."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he denied it before them all, saying,

block.text: Tasol Pita i tok nogat long ai bilong olgeta man olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I don’t know what you are talking about.”

block.text: "Mi no save long dispela tok yu mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had gone out onto the porch, someone else saw him, and said to those who were there,

block.text: Na bihain em i go long haus i stap long dua bilong banis, na narapela wokmeri i lukim em na i tokim ol manmeri i stap klostu olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This man also was with Jesus of Nazareth.”

block.text: "Dispela man i bin i stap wantaim Jisas bilong Nasaret."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again he denied it with an oath,

block.text: Na Pita i tok nogat gen olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I don’t know the man.”

block.text: "Tru antap, mi no save long dispela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: After a little while those who stood by came and said to Peter,

block.text: Bihain liklik ol man i sanap i stap klostu, ol i kam tokim Pita olsem,

block.characterId: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)/those standing near

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)/those standing near
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Surely you are also one of them, for your speech makes you known.”

block.text: "Tru tumas, yu man bilong lain bilong ol. Nek bilong yu I kamapim yu pinis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he began to curse and to swear,
