block.text: Orait nau Pita i tok strong tru olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I don’t know the man!”

block.text: "Tru antap, mi no save long dispela man. Sapos mi no tok tru, orait God i ken bagarapim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately the rooster
crowed.
Peter remembered the word which Jesus had said to him,

block.text: Em i tok pinis, na wantu kakaruk
i krai.
Na Pita i tingim gen dispela tok Jisas i bin mekim,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Before the rooster crows, you will deny me three times.”

block.text: "Taim kakaruk i no krai yet, yu bai tok tripela taim olsem yu no save long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went out and wept bitterly.

block.text: Na Pita i go ausait na i krai nogut tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 27
Now when morning had come, all the chief priests and the elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death.

block.text: Tulait i kamap, na olgeta bikpris na ol hetman bilong ol manmeri ol i wokim toktok bilong kilim Jisas i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They bound him, led him away, and delivered him up to Pontius Pilate, the governor.

block.text: Na bihain ol i pasim em long baklain, na ol i kisim em i go na putim em long han bilong namba wan gavman Pailat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Judas, who betrayed him, when he saw that Jesus was condemned, felt remorse, and brought back the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders,
saying,

block.text: Judas, em dispela man i bin givim Jisas long han bilong ol birua, em i lukim ol i daunim Jisas long kot na putim hevi long en. Na em i senisim tingting bilong en na em i kisim dispela 30 mani silva ol bikpris na ol hetman i bin givim long em, na em i bringim i go bek long ol.
Na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I have sinned in that I betrayed innocent blood.”

block.text: "Mi bin mekim sin. Dispela man mi givim long han bilong yupela, em i no bin mekim rong. Na yupela bai i kilim em i dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they said,

block.text: Tasol ol i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is that to us? You see to it.”

block.text: "Em i no samting bilong mipela. Em wari bilong yu tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He threw
down the pieces of silver in the sanctuary, and departed. He went away and hanged himself.

block.text: Na Judas i tromoi
ol dispela mani silva insait long banis bilong tempel, na em i go hangamapim em yet na em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The chief priests took the pieces of silver, and said,

block.text: Ol bikpris i kisim dispela mani silva, na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It’s not lawful to put them into the treasury, since it is the price of blood.”

block.text: "Dispela mani em i pe bilong kilim man i dai. Yumi no ken putim wantaim mani bilong tempel."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said:

block.text: Na ol i pasim wanpela tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We shall use the money to buy the land called the Potter’s Field so that strangers can be buried there.”

block.text: na long dispela mani ol i baim hap graun bilong ol man bilong wokim sospen graun. Ol i laik bai dispela graun i stap matmat bilong ol man bilong ol longwe ples.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore that field was called “The Field of Blood” to this day.

block.text: Olsem na dispela hap graun i kisim nem, Graun Bilong Blut, na ol man i save kolim olsem yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then, that which was spoken through Jeremiah the prophet was fulfilled, saying,

block.text: Olsem na wanpela tok bipo God i bin mekim long maus bilong profet Jeremaia em i kamap tru. Em i bin tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “They took the thirty pieces of silver, the price of him upon whom a price had been set, whom some of the children of Israel priced,
and they gave them for the potter’s field, as the Lord commanded me.”

block.text: "Ol i kisim dispela 30 mani silva. Ol Israel i bin makim dispela pe olsem pe bilong baim dispela man.
Na long dispela mani ol i baim graun bilong man bilong wokim sospen graun, olsem Bikpela i bin tokim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now Jesus stood before the governor: and the governor asked him, saying,

block.text: Jisas i sanap i stap long ai bilong namba wan gavman Pailat, na Pailat i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you the King of the Jews?”

block.text: "Yu king bilong ol Juda, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas I tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes… it is as you say.”

block.text: "Yu yet yu tok olsem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he was accused by the chief priests and elders, he answered nothing.
Then Pilate said to him,

block.text: Na ol bikpris wantaim ol hetman ol i sutim planti tok long Jisas. Tasol em i no bekim wanpela tok.
Olsem na Pailat i askim em gen olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t you hear how many things they testify against you?”

block.text: "Ating yu no harim olgeta dispela toktok ol i sutim long yu?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He gave him no answer, not even one word, so that the governor marveled greatly.

block.text: Na Jisas i no bekim wanpela tok long Pailat. Olsem na Pailat i tingting planti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now at the feast the governor was accustomed to releasing to the multitude one prisoner whom they desired.

block.text: Long olgeta yia long dispela bikpela de bilong lotu, namba wan gavman i save lusim wanpela kalabusman. Ol manmeri yet i save kolim nem bilong wanpela man i stap long kalabus, na Pailat i save lusim dispela man i go long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They had a notable prisoner, called Barabbas.

block.text: Na long dispela taim i gat wanpela man nogut tru i stap long kalabus, nem bilong en Jisas Barabas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore, when they were gathered together, Pilate said to them,

block.text: Ol manmeri i kam bung pinis, orait Pailat i askim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Whom do you want me to release to you? Barabbas, or Jesus, who is called Christ?”

block.text: "Yupela i laik bai mi lusim husat i go long yupela? Bai mi lusim Jisas Barabas, o bai mi lusim dispela Jisas ol i tok God i bin salim em i kam?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he knew that they had delivered him up because of envy.

block.text: Pailat i tok olsem, long wanem, em i save, ol i bel nogut tasol long Jisas, na ol i bringim em i kam long kot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: While he was sitting on the judgment seat, his wife sent to him, saying,

block.text: Na tu, taim Pailat i sindaun i stap long sia bilong jas, meri bilong en i bin salim tok i kam long em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have nothing to do with that righteous man, for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him.”

block.text: "Yu no ken mekim wanpela samting long dispela stretpela man. Long nait mi lukim em long wanpela driman, na mi pilim bikpela hevi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the chief priests and the elders persuaded the multitudes to ask for Barabbas, and destroy Jesus.

block.text: Ol bikpris wantaim ol hetman i kirapim bel bilong ol manmeri, long ol i mas singaut long Pailat i mas lusim Barabas na i kilim Jisas i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the governor answered them,

block.text: Na namba wan gavman i askim ol gen olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Which of the two do you want me to release to you?”

block.text: "Yupela i laik bai mi lusim husat bilong dispela tupela man?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said,

block.text: Na ol manmeri i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Barabbas!”

block.text: "Barabas."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate said to them,

block.text: Na Pailat i askim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What then shall I do to Jesus, who is called Christ?”

block.text: "Na yupela i laik bai mi mekim wanem long dispela Jisas ol i tok God i bin salim em i kam?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They all said to him,

block.text: Na olgeta i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Crucify him!”

block.text: "Nilim em long diwai kros."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the governor said,

block.text: Na Pailat i askim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why? What evil has he done?”

block.text: "Bilong wanem? Em i mekim wanem rong?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they cried out exceedingly, saying,

block.text: Tasol ol i singaut strong moa,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Crucify him!”

block.text: "Nilim em long diwai kros."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So when Pilate saw that nothing was being gained, but rather that a disturbance was starting, he took water, and washed his hands before the multitude, saying,

block.text: Pailat i save nau, ol bai i no inap harim tok bilong en, na bikpela pait i laik kirap. Olsem na em i kisim sampela wara na em i wasim han bilong en long ai bilong ol manmeri. Na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am innocent of the blood of this righteous person. You see to it.”

block.text: "I no asua bilong mi sapos dispela man i dai. Em i samting bilong yupela tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: All the people answered,

block.text: Na olgeta manmeri i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “May his blood be on us, and on our children!”

block.text: "Dispela asua i ken i stap long mipela na long ol pikinini bilong mipela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he released to them Barabbas, but Jesus he flogged and delivered to be crucified.

block.text: Olsem na Pailat i lusim Barabas i go long ol. Na em i tok na ol soldia i wipim Jisas. Na bihain em i givim Jisas long han bilong ol soldia, bai ol i nilim em long diwai kros.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the governor’s soldiers took Jesus into the Praetorium, and gathered the whole garrison together against him.

block.text: Orait ol soldia bilong namba wan gavman i bringim Jisas i go insait long haus gavman, na olgeta i kam bung long pes bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They stripped him, and put a scarlet robe on him.

block.text: Na ol i rausim klos bilong em, na ol i putim wanpela retpela klos long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They braided a crown of thorns and put it on his head, and a reed in his right hand; and they kneeled down before him, and mocked him, saying,

block.text: Na ol i kisim ol rop i gat nil na wokim samting olsem hat bilong king, na ol i putim long het bilong em. Na ol i putim wanpela stik long han sut bilong en. Na ol i brukim skru long en, na ol i tok bilas long em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hail, King of the Jews!”

block.text: "Gude, king bilong ol Juda."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They spat on him, and took the reed and struck him on the head.

block.text: Na ol i spet long em, na ol i kisim dispela stik ol i bin putim long han bilong Jisas na ol i paitim het bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had mocked him, they took the robe off of him, and put his clothes on him, and led him away to crucify him.

block.text: Ol i mekim dispela olgeta pasin bilong tok bilas long em pinis, orait ol i rausim dispela klos ol i bin putim long em, na ol i putim bek klos bilong em yet. Na ol i kisim em i go bilong hangamapim em long diwai kros.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As they came out, they found a man of Cyrene, Simon by name, and they compelled him to go with them, that he might carry his cross.

block.text: Ol i wokabaut i go, na ol soldia i lukim wanpela man bilong taun Sairini, nem bilong en Saimon. Na ol i kisim em na mekim em i karim diwai kros bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They came to a place called “Golgotha,” that is to say, “The place of a skull.”

block.text: Orait ol i go kamap long wanpela ples, nem bilong en Golgota. As bilong dispela nem i olsem, Ples bilong bun bilong het. Na long dispela ples

ReferenceBlocks.text: They gave him sour wine to drink mixed with gall. When he had tasted it, he would not drink.

block.text: ol i givim Jisas sampela wain ol i bin tanim wantaim marasin i gat pait nogut, bai em i dring. Na em i traim, tasol em i no dring.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had crucified him, they divided his clothing among them, casting lots, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet,

block.text: Ol soldia i hangamapim Jisas pinis long diwai kros, orait ol i pilai satu bilong tilim ol klos samting bilong en namel long ol yet. that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “They parted my clothes among them, and for my cloak they cast lots.”

block.text: “They parted my clothes among them, and for my cloak they cast lots.”

ReferenceBlocks.text: and they sat and watched him there.

block.text: Na ol i sindaun long dispela ples, na ol i was long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They set up over his head the accusation against him written, “THIS IS JESUS, THE KING OF THE JEWS.”

block.text: Antap long het bilong en ol i raitim dispela tok ol i bin kotim em long en. Ol i raitim tok olsem, "Dispela em Jisas, King bilong ol Juda."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then there were two robbers crucified with him, one on his right hand and one on the left.

block.text: Klostu long Jisas ol i hangamapim tupela man bilong pait na stil. Ol i hangamapim wanpela long diwai kros i stap long han sut bilong em, na wanpela long diwai kros i stap long long han kais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who passed by blasphemed him, wagging their heads,
and saying,

block.text: Na ol manmeri i kam i go, ol i tok bilas long em. Ol i naisim het
na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You who destroy the temple, and build it in three days, save yourself! If you are the Son of God, come down from the cross!”

block.text: "Yu man bilong brukim tempel na sanapim gen long tripela de tasol, yu ken helpim yu yet. Sapos i tru yu Pikinini Bilong God, orait lusim diwai kros na kam daun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Likewise the chief priests also mocking, with the scribes, the Pharisees, and the elders, said,

block.text: Ol bikpris wantaim ol saveman bilong lo na ol hetman tu ol i tok bilas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He saved others, but he can’t save himself. If he is the King of Israel, let him come down from the cross now, and we will believe in him.

block.text: "Em i bin helpim ol arapela man, tasol em i no inap helpim em yet. Em i king bilong Israel. Orait em i ken lusim diwai kros na i kam daun, na bai yumi bilip long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He trusts in God. Let God deliver him now, if he wants him; for he said, ‘I am the Son of God.’”

block.text: Em i bilip long God na i tok, 'Mi Pikinini Bilong God.' Orait, sapos God i laikim em, God i ken helpim em nau."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The robbers also who were crucified with him cast on him the same reproach.

block.text: Tupela stilman ol i bin hangamapim long ol diwai kros klostu long Jisas, tupela tu i mekim ol wankain tok bilas tasol long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land until the ninth hour.

block.text: Long 12 klok, tudak i karamapim graun olgeta, i go inap long 3 klok long apinun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: About the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying,

block.text: Na klostu long 3 klok Jisas i singaut strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani?”

block.text: "Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: That is,

block.text: As bilong dispela tok i olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My God, my God, why have you forsaken me?”

block.text: "God bilong mi, God bilong mi, bilong wanem yu lusim mi?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some of them who stood there, when they heard it, said,

block.text: Sampela man i sanap klostu, ol i harim dispela tok, na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This man is calling Elijah.”

block.text: "Dispela man i singautim Elaija."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately one of them ran, and took a sponge, and filled it with vinegar, and put it on a reed, and gave him a drink.
The rest said,

block.text: Na kwiktaim wanpela bilong ol i ran i go kisim wanpela spans na putim long wain. Na taim wain i pulap long en, em i pasim long wanpela stik na i givim long Jisas bilong dring.
Tasol ol arapela i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let him be. Let’s see whether Elijah comes to save him.”

block.text: "Wet, yumi lukim pastaim. Ating bai Elaija i kam helpim em, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus cried again with a loud voice, and yielded up his spirit.

block.text: Jisas i singaut strong moa gen, na em i lusim spirit bilong en i go na em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, the veil of the temple was torn
in two from the top to the bottom. The earth quaked and the rocks were split.

block.text: Long dispela taim tasol dispela bikpela laplap i hangamap i stap insait long tempel em i bruk
long antap i go inap long daunbilo bilong en, na i kamap tupela hap. Na graun i guria, na ol bikpela ston i bruk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The tombs were opened and many bodies of the saints who had fallen asleep were raised.

block.text: Na ol ples matmat i op, na planti manmeri bilong God, bipo ol i dai pinis, nau ol i kirap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Coming out of the tombs after his resurrection, they entered into the holy city and appeared to many.

block.text: Ol i lusim matmat, na bihain long Jisas i kirap bek pinis, ol i go insait long taun bilong God. Na planti man i lukim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the centurion and those who were with him watching Jesus, when they saw the earthquake and the things that were done, they were greatly afraid and said,

block.text: Kepten wantaim ol soldia i was long Jisas i stap, ol i lukim graun i guria na ol samting i kamap, na ol i pret moa. Na ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Truly this was the Son of God.”

block.text: "Tru tumas, dispela man em i Pikinini Bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Many women were there watching from afar, who had followed Jesus from Galilee, serving him.

block.text: Planti meri tu i stap, ol i bin bihainim Jisas na i lusim Galili na i kam bilong helpim em. Ol dispela meri i sanap longwe liklik na ol i lukluk i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Among them were Mary Magdalene, Mary the mother of James and Joses, and the mother of the sons of Zebedee.

block.text: Wanpela namel long ol em Maria bilong taun Makdala. Na wanpela em Maria, mama bilong Jems tupela Josep. Na wanpela em mama bilong tupela pikinini bilong Sebedi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When evening had come, a rich man from Arimathaea, named Joseph, who himself was also Jesus’ disciple came.

block.text: Long apinun wanpela maniman bilong taun Arimatea, nem bilong en Josep, em i kam. Em tu i disaipel bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This man went to Pilate, and asked for Jesus’ body. Then Pilate commanded the body to be given up.

block.text: Em i go long Pailat na i askim Pailat long larim em i kisim bodi bilong Jisas. Orait Pailat i tokim ol soldia na ol i givim bodi long Josep.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Joseph took the body, and wrapped it in a clean linen cloth.

block.text: Na Josep i kisim bodi na i karamapim long klinpela waitpela laplap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He laid it in his own new tomb, which he had cut out in the rock. He rolled a great stone to the door of the tomb, and departed.

block.text: Na em i kisim bodi i go na putim insait long nupela matmat bilong em yet. Dispela matmat em wanpela hul bilong ston Josep i bin tokim ol man long wokim. Na Josep i tantanim wanpela bikpela ston i kam pasim maus bilong hul. Em i mekim olsem pinis, na em i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary Magdalene was there, and the other Mary, sitting opposite the tomb.

block.text: Maria bilong Makdala wantaim narapela Maria, tupela i stap. Tupela i sindaun klostu long matmat, na tupela i lukluk i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now on the next day, which was the day after the Preparation Day, the chief priests and the Pharisees were gathered together to Pilate,
saying,

block.text: De bilong redim ol samting bilong de Sabat em i pinis, na long de bihain, ol bikpris wantaim ol Farisi ol i go lukim Pailat.
Ol i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Sir, we remember what that deceiver said while he was still alive: ‘After three days I will rise again.’

block.text: "Bikman, mipela i tingim wanpela tok dispela man bilong giaman i bin mekim long taim em i stap yet. Em i tok, 'Bihain long tripela de bai mi kirap bek.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Command therefore that the tomb be made secure until the third day, lest perhaps his disciples come at night and steal him away, and tell the people, ‘He is risen from the dead;’ and the last deception will be worse than the first.”

block.text: Olsem na yu mas tok na ol i ken pasim gut dispela matmat inap long tripela de. Nogut ol disaipel bilong en i kam stilim bodi bilong en na tokim ol manmeri olsem, 'Em i kirap bek long matmat.' Na dispela nupela tok giaman bilong ol bai i winim tok giaman em i bin mekim bipo."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate said to them,

block.text: Orait Pailat i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You have a guard. Go, make it as secure as you can.”

block.text: "Yupela kisim ol soldia na tokim ol long was i stap long dispela matmat. Yupela go na mekim olgeta samting yupela i laik mekim bilong pasim strong dispela matmat."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So they went with the guard and made the tomb secure, sealing the stone.

block.text: Orait na ol i go pasim matmat. Ol i putim mak bilong tambuim dispela ston i stap long maus bilong hul, na ol i putim ol soldia bilong was long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: MATTHEW 28
Now after the Sabbath, as it began to dawn on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary came to see the tomb.

block.text: De Sabat i pinis, na taim san klostu i laik kamap long namba wan de bilong wik, orait Maria bilong Makdala wantaim narapela Maria tupela i kam bilong lukim matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, there was a great earthquake, for an angel of the Lord descended from the sky, and came and rolled away the stone from the door, and sat on it.

block.text: Na wantu tasol bikpela guria i kamap. Ensel bilong Bikpela i lusim heven na i kam daun, na em i tantanim ston i go lusim maus bilong hul na em i sindaun i stap antap long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His appearance was like lightning, and his clothing white as snow.

block.text: Pes bilong ensel i lait olsem lait bilong klaut, na klos bilong en i waitpela olsem ais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The guards were so afraid of him that they shook and became like dead men.

block.text: Ol soldia i pret long em, na ol i guria nogut, na ol i kamap olsem ol man i dai pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel answered the women,

block.text: Tasol ensel i tokim tupela meri olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t be afraid, for I know that you seek Jesus, who has been crucified.

block.text: "Yutupela i no ken pret. Mi save, yutupela i kam bilong painim Jisas, em dispela man ol i bin hangamapim long diwai kros.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He is not here, for he has risen, just like he said. Come, see the place where the Lord was lying.

block.text: Em i no i stap hia. Em i kirap pinis, olsem bipo em i bin tok. Yutupela kam lukim ples em i bin slip long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Go quickly and tell his disciples, ‘He has risen from the dead, and behold, he goes before you into Galilee; there you will see him.’ Behold, I have told you.”

block.text: Na yutupela go kwiktaim na tokim ol disaipel bilong en olsem, em i lusim matmat na i kirap bek pinis. Harim. Em i go paslain long yupela long Galili, na yupela bai i lukim em long dispela hap. Mi kam bilong givim dispela tok long yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They departed quickly from the tomb with fear and great joy, and ran to bring his disciples word.

block.text: Tupela meri i pret tru, tasol tupela i amamas moa moa yet, na kwiktaim tupela i lusim matmat na i ran i go bilong tokim ol disaipel bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As they went to tell his disciples, behold, Jesus met them, saying,

block.text: Na Jisas i bungim tupela long rot, na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rejoice!”

block.text: "Moning tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They came and took hold of his feet, and worshiped him.
Then Jesus said to them,

block.text: Na tupela i go klostu na i holim lek bilong en, na tupela i lotu long em.
Na Jisas i tokim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t be afraid. Go tell my brothers that they should go into Galilee, and there they will see me.”

block.text: "Yutupela i no ken pret. Yutupela go tokim ol brata bilong mi long ol i mas i go long Galili. Ol bai i lukim mi long dispela hap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now while they were going, behold, some of the guards came into the city, and told the chief priests all the things that had happened.

block.text: Tupela meri i go yet, na sampela soldia i bin was long matmat ol i go insait long taun, na ol i tokim ol bikpris long olgeta samting i bin kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they were assembled with the elders, and had taken counsel, they gave a large amount of silver to the soldiers,
saying,

block.text: Na ol bikpris i bung wantaim ol hetman, na ol i wokim wanpela tok. Ol i givim planti mani long ol soldia,
na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Say that his disciples came by night, and stole him away while we slept.

block.text: "Yupela i mas tok olsem, 'Ol disaipel bilong en i kam long nait, na taim mipela i slip, ol i stilim bodi bilong en.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: If this comes to the governor’s ears, we will persuade him and make you free of worry.”

block.text: Na sapos namba wan gavman i harim dispela tok, orait mipela i ken stretim tok wantaim em, na bai yupela i no gat trabel."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So they took the money and did as they were told. This saying was spread abroad among the Jews, and continues until this day.

block.text: Orait ol soldia i kisim mani, na ol i bihainim dispela tok bilong ol bikman. Na dispela tok i go nabaut namel long ol Juda, na ol Juda i save mekim dispela tok yet i kam inap long nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the eleven disciples went into Galilee, to the mountain where Jesus had sent them.

block.text: Ol 11 -pela disaipel i wokabaut i go long Galili, na ol i kamap long dispela maunten Jisas i bin tok bai ol i mas i go long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they saw him, they bowed down to him, but some doubted.

block.text: Na ol i lukim Jisas, na ol i lotu long em. Tasol sampela i gat tupela tingting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus came to them and said,

block.text: Na Jisas i kam klostu na i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “All authority has been given to me in heaven and on earth.

block.text: "God i givim mi bikpela namba na strong bilong bosim olgeta samting long heven na long graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Go, and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas i go mekim olgeta lain manmeri i kamap disaipel bilong mi. Na yupela baptaisim ol long nem bilong Papa na bilong Pikinini na bilong Holi Spirit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Teach them to observe all things that I commanded you. Behold, I am with you always, even to the end of the age.” Amen.

block.text: Na yupela lainim ol long bihainim olgeta tok mi bin givim long yupela. Harim. Mi save stap wantaim yupela olgeta de, i go inap long dispela taim i pinis."
